	bool "IGMP/MLD snooping"
	depends on BRIDGE
	depends on INET
	default y
config BRIDGE_VLAN_FILTERING
	bool "VLAN filtering"
	depends on BRIDGE

	depends on ISA && AX25 && ISA_DMA_API

	depends on SCC

	depends on SCC

	depends on AX25 && !S390
	select CRC_CCITT

	depends on AX25 && !S390

	depends on PARPORT && AX25

menu "Infrared-port device drivers"
	depends on IRDA!=n
comment "SIR device drivers"
config IRTTY_SIR
	tristate "IrTTY (uses Linux serial driver)"
	depends on IRDA && TTY

	tristate "Blackfin SIR on UART"
	depends on BLACKFIN && IRDA
	default n

	bool "Blackfin SIR on UART0"
	depends on BFIN_SIR && !SERIAL_BFIN_UART0
config BFIN_SIR1
	bool "Blackfin SIR on UART1"
	depends on BFIN_SIR && !SERIAL_BFIN_UART1 && (!BF531 && !BF532 && !BF533 && !BF561)
config BFIN_SIR2
	bool "Blackfin SIR on UART2"
	depends on BFIN_SIR && !SERIAL_BFIN_UART2 && (BF54x || BF538 || BF539)
config BFIN_SIR3
	bool "Blackfin SIR on UART3"
	depends on BFIN_SIR && !SERIAL_BFIN_UART3 && (BF54x)

	prompt "SIR Mode"
	depends on BFIN_SIR
	default SIR_BFIN_DMA
config SIR_BFIN_DMA
	bool "DMA mode"
	depends on !DMA_UNCACHED_NONE
config SIR_BFIN_PIO
	bool "PIO mode"
endchoice

		(CPU_SUBTYPE_SH7722 || CPU_SUBTYPE_SH7723 || \
		 CPU_SUBTYPE_SH7724)

	select CRYPTO_CMAC
	select CRYPTO_ECB
	select CRYPTO_SHA256

	depends on BT
	default y

#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/net/mac80211/Kconfig
config MAC80211
	tristate "Generic IEEE 802.11 Networking Stack (mac80211)"
	depends on CFG80211
	select CRYPTO
	select CRYPTO_ARC4
	select CRYPTO_AES
	select CRYPTO_CCM
	select CRYPTO_GCM
	select CRC32
	select AVERAGE
comment "CFG80211 needs to be enabled for MAC80211"
	depends on CFG80211=n
if MAC80211 != n
config MAC80211_HAS_RC
	bool
config MAC80211_RC_MINSTREL
	bool "Minstrel" if EXPERT
	select MAC80211_HAS_RC
	default y
config MAC80211_RC_MINSTREL_HT
	bool "Minstrel 802.11n support" if EXPERT
	depends on MAC80211_RC_MINSTREL
	default y
config MAC80211_RC_MINSTREL_VHT
	bool "Minstrel 802.11ac support" if EXPERT
	depends on MAC80211_RC_MINSTREL_HT
	default n
choice
	prompt "Default rate control algorithm"
	depends on MAC80211_HAS_RC
	default MAC80211_RC_DEFAULT_MINSTREL
config MAC80211_RC_DEFAULT_MINSTREL
	bool "Minstrel"
	depends on MAC80211_RC_MINSTREL
endchoice
config MAC80211_RC_DEFAULT
	string
	default "minstrel_ht" if MAC80211_RC_DEFAULT_MINSTREL && MAC80211_RC_MINSTREL_HT
	default "minstrel" if MAC80211_RC_DEFAULT_MINSTREL
	default ""
endif
comment "Some wireless drivers require a rate control algorithm"
	depends on MAC80211 && MAC80211_HAS_RC=n

	depends on MAC80211

	select LEDS_TRIGGERS

	depends on MAC80211 && DEBUG_FS

	depends on MAC80211

	depends on MAC80211

	tristate "NFC PN544 i2c support"
	depends on NFC_PN544 && I2C && NFC_SHDLC
config NFC_PN544_MEI
	tristate "NFC PN544 MEI support"
	depends on NFC_PN544 && NFC_MEI_PHY

	depends on FW_LOADER

#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/drivers/base/regmap/Kconfig
config REGMAP
	default y if (REGMAP_I2C || REGMAP_SPI || REGMAP_SPMI || REGMAP_AC97 || REGMAP_MMIO || REGMAP_IRQ)
	select LZO_COMPRESS
	select LZO_DECOMPRESS
	select IRQ_DOMAIN if REGMAP_IRQ
	bool
config REGMAP_AC97
	tristate
config REGMAP_I2C
	tristate
	depends on I2C
config REGMAP_SPI
	tristate
	depends on SPI
config REGMAP_SPMI
	tristate
	depends on SPMI
config REGMAP_MMIO
	tristate
config REGMAP_IRQ
	bool
config DMA_SHARED_BUFFER
	bool
	default n
	select ANON_INODES
config FENCE_TRACE
	bool "Enable verbose FENCE_TRACE messages"
	depends on DMA_SHARED_BUFFER
config DMA_CMA
	bool "DMA Contiguous Memory Allocator"
	depends on HAVE_DMA_CONTIGUOUS && CMA
if  DMA_CMA
comment "Default contiguous memory area size:"
config CMA_SIZE_MBYTES
	int "Size in Mega Bytes"
	depends on !CMA_SIZE_SEL_PERCENTAGE
	default 0 if X86
	default 16
config CMA_SIZE_PERCENTAGE
	int "Percentage of total memory"
	depends on !CMA_SIZE_SEL_MBYTES
	default 0 if X86
	default 10
choice
	prompt "Selected region size"
	default CMA_SIZE_SEL_MBYTES
config CMA_SIZE_SEL_MBYTES
	bool "Use mega bytes value only"
config CMA_SIZE_SEL_PERCENTAGE
	bool "Use percentage value only"
config CMA_SIZE_SEL_MIN
	bool "Use lower value (minimum)"
config CMA_SIZE_SEL_MAX
	bool "Use higher value (maximum)"
endchoice
config CMA_ALIGNMENT
	int "Maximum PAGE_SIZE order of alignment for contiguous buffers"
	range 4 12
	default 8
endif
endmenu

	depends on BLOCK

	depends on MTD_BLOCK!=y && BLOCK

	depends on BLOCK

	depends on MTD && SWAP

	default n
	depends on MTD
#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/drivers/mtd/chips/Kconfig
menu "RAM/ROM/Flash chip drivers"
	depends on MTD!=n
config MTD_CFI
	tristate "Detect flash chips by Common Flash Interface (CFI) probe"
	select MTD_GEN_PROBE
	select MTD_CFI_UTIL
config MTD_JEDECPROBE
	tristate "Detect non-CFI AMD/JEDEC-compatible flash chips"
	select MTD_GEN_PROBE
config MTD_GEN_PROBE
	tristate
config MTD_CFI_ADV_OPTIONS
	bool "Flash chip driver advanced configuration options"
	depends on MTD_GEN_PROBE
choice
	prompt "Flash cmd/query data swapping"
	depends on MTD_CFI_ADV_OPTIONS
	default MTD_CFI_NOSWAP
config MTD_CFI_NOSWAP
	bool "NO"
config MTD_CFI_BE_BYTE_SWAP
	bool "BIG_ENDIAN_BYTE"
config MTD_CFI_LE_BYTE_SWAP
	bool "LITTLE_ENDIAN_BYTE"
endchoice
config MTD_CFI_GEOMETRY
	bool "Specific CFI Flash geometry selection"
	depends on MTD_CFI_ADV_OPTIONS
config MTD_MAP_BANK_WIDTH_1
	bool "Support  8-bit buswidth" if MTD_CFI_GEOMETRY
	default y
config MTD_MAP_BANK_WIDTH_2
	bool "Support 16-bit buswidth" if MTD_CFI_GEOMETRY
	default y
config MTD_MAP_BANK_WIDTH_4
	bool "Support 32-bit buswidth" if MTD_CFI_GEOMETRY
	default y
config MTD_MAP_BANK_WIDTH_8
	bool "Support 64-bit buswidth" if MTD_CFI_GEOMETRY
	default n
config MTD_MAP_BANK_WIDTH_16
	bool "Support 128-bit buswidth" if MTD_CFI_GEOMETRY
	default n
config MTD_MAP_BANK_WIDTH_32
	bool "Support 256-bit buswidth" if MTD_CFI_GEOMETRY
	default n
config MTD_CFI_I1
	bool "Support 1-chip flash interleave" if MTD_CFI_GEOMETRY
	default y
config MTD_CFI_I2
	bool "Support 2-chip flash interleave" if MTD_CFI_GEOMETRY
	default y
config MTD_CFI_I4
	bool "Support 4-chip flash interleave" if MTD_CFI_GEOMETRY
	default n
config MTD_CFI_I8
	bool "Support 8-chip flash interleave" if MTD_CFI_GEOMETRY
	default n
config MTD_OTP
	bool "Protection Registers aka one-time programmable (OTP) bits"
	depends on MTD_CFI_ADV_OPTIONS
	default n
config MTD_CFI_INTELEXT
	tristate "Support for CFI command set 0001 (Intel/Sharp chips)"
	depends on MTD_GEN_PROBE
	select MTD_CFI_UTIL
config MTD_CFI_AMDSTD
	tristate "Support for CFI command set 0002 (AMD/Fujitsu/Spansion chips)"
	depends on MTD_GEN_PROBE
	select MTD_CFI_UTIL
config MTD_CFI_STAA
	tristate "Support for CFI command set 0020 (ST (Advanced Architecture) chips)"
	depends on MTD_GEN_PROBE
	select MTD_CFI_UTIL
config MTD_CFI_UTIL
	tristate
config MTD_RAM
	tristate "Support for RAM chips in bus mapping"
config MTD_ROM
	tristate "Support for ROM chips in bus mapping"
config MTD_ABSENT
	tristate "Support for absent chips in bus mapping"
config MTD_XIP
	bool "XIP aware MTD support"
	depends on !SMP && (MTD_CFI_INTELEXT || MTD_CFI_AMDSTD) && ARCH_MTD_XIP
	default y if XIP_KERNEL
endmenu

	select BITREVERSE
config MTD_ST_SPI_FSM
	tristate "ST Microelectronics SPI FSM Serial Flash Controller"
	depends on ARCH_STI
if MTD_DOCG3
config BCH_CONST_M
	default 14
config BCH_CONST_T
	default 4
endif
endmenu

#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/drivers/of/Kconfig
config DTC
	bool
config OF
	bool
menu "Device Tree and Open Firmware support"
	depends on OF
config OF_UNITTEST
	bool "Device Tree runtime unit tests"
	depends on OF_IRQ && OF_EARLY_FLATTREE
	select OF_RESOLVE
config OF_FLATTREE
	bool
	select DTC
	select LIBFDT
	select CRC32
config OF_EARLY_FLATTREE
	bool
	select OF_FLATTREE
config OF_PROMTREE
	bool
config OF_DYNAMIC
	bool "Support for dynamic device trees" if OF_UNITTEST
config OF_ADDRESS
	def_bool y
	depends on !SPARC
	select OF_ADDRESS_PCI if PCI
config OF_ADDRESS_PCI
	bool
config OF_IRQ
	def_bool y
	depends on !SPARC && IRQ_DOMAIN
config OF_NET
	depends on NETDEVICES
	def_bool y
config OF_MDIO
	def_tristate PHYLIB
	depends on PHYLIB
config OF_PCI
	def_tristate PCI
	depends on PCI
config OF_PCI_IRQ
	def_tristate PCI
	depends on OF_PCI && OF_IRQ
config OF_MTD
	depends on MTD
	def_bool y
config OF_RESERVED_MEM
	depends on OF_EARLY_FLATTREE
	bool
config OF_RESOLVE
	bool
config OF_OVERLAY
	bool "Device Tree overlays"
	select OF_DYNAMIC
	select OF_RESOLVE
endmenu

config BLK_DEV_XPRAM
	def_tristate m
	prompt "XPRAM disk support"
	depends on S390 && BLOCK
config DCSSBLK
	def_tristate m
	prompt "DCSSBLK support"
	depends on S390 && BLOCK
config DASD
	def_tristate y
	prompt "Support for DASD devices"
	depends on CCW && BLOCK
	select IOSCHED_DEADLINE
config DASD_PROFILE
	def_bool y
	prompt "Profiling support for dasd devices"
	depends on DASD
config DASD_ECKD
	def_tristate y
	prompt "Support for ECKD Disks"
	depends on DASD
config DASD_FBA
	def_tristate y
	prompt "Support for FBA  Disks"
	depends on DASD
config DASD_DIAG
	def_tristate y
	prompt "Support for DIAG access to Disks"
	depends on DASD
config DASD_EER
	def_bool y
	prompt "Extended error reporting (EER)"
	depends on DASD
config SCM_BLOCK
	def_tristate m
	prompt "Support for Storage Class Memory"
	depends on S390 && BLOCK && EADM_SCH && SCM_BUS
config SCM_BLOCK_CLUSTER_WRITE
	def_bool y
	prompt "SCM force cluster writes"
	depends on SCM_BLOCK
config XILINX_SYSACE
	tristate "Xilinx SystemACE support"
	depends on 4xx || MICROBLAZE
config XEN_BLKDEV_FRONTEND
	tristate "Xen virtual block device support"
	depends on XEN
	default y
	select XEN_XENBUS_FRONTEND
config XEN_BLKDEV_BACKEND
	tristate "Xen block-device backend driver"
	depends on XEN_BACKEND
config VIRTIO_BLK
	tristate "Virtio block driver"
	depends on VIRTIO
config BLK_DEV_HD
	bool "Very old hard disk (MFM/RLL/IDE) driver"
	depends on HAVE_IDE
	depends on !ARM || ARCH_RPC || BROKEN
config BLK_DEV_RBD
	tristate "Rados block device (RBD)"
	depends on INET && BLOCK
	select CEPH_LIB
	select LIBCRC32C
	select CRYPTO_AES
	select CRYPTO
	default n
config BLK_DEV_RSXX
	tristate "IBM Flash Adapter 900GB Full Height PCIe Device Driver"
	depends on PCI
endif

	depends on ARCH_DAVINCI
	select IDE_TIMINGS
	select BLK_DEV_IDEDMA_SFF
if ISA && (ALPHA || X86 || MIPS)
comment "Other IDE chipsets support"
comment "Note: most of these also require special kernel boot parameters"
config BLK_DEV_4DRIVES
	tristate "Generic 4 drives/port support"
config BLK_DEV_ALI14XX
	tristate "ALI M14xx support"
	select IDE_TIMINGS
	select IDE_LEGACY
config BLK_DEV_DTC2278
	tristate "DTC-2278 support"
	select IDE_XFER_MODE
	select IDE_LEGACY
config BLK_DEV_HT6560B
	tristate "Holtek HT6560B support"
	select IDE_TIMINGS
	select IDE_LEGACY
config BLK_DEV_QD65XX
	tristate "QDI QD65xx support"
	select IDE_TIMINGS
	select IDE_LEGACY
config BLK_DEV_UMC8672
	tristate "UMC-8672 support"
	select IDE_XFER_MODE
	select IDE_LEGACY
endif
config BLK_DEV_IDEDMA
	def_bool BLK_DEV_IDEDMA_SFF || \
		 BLK_DEV_IDEDMA_ICS || BLK_DEV_IDE_AU1XXX_MDMA2_DBDMA
	select IDE_XFER_MODE
endif 
#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/drivers/scsi/Kconfig
menu "SCSI device support"
config SCSI_MOD
       tristate
       default y if SCSI=n || SCSI=y
       default m if SCSI=m
config RAID_ATTRS
	tristate "RAID Transport Class"
	default n
	depends on BLOCK
	depends on SCSI_MOD
config SCSI
	tristate "SCSI device support"
	depends on BLOCK
	select SCSI_DMA if HAS_DMA
config SCSI_DMA
	bool
	default n
config SCSI_NETLINK
	bool
	default	n
	depends on NET
config SCSI_MQ_DEFAULT
	bool "SCSI: use blk-mq I/O path by default"
	depends on SCSI
config SCSI_PROC_FS
	bool "legacy /proc/scsi/ support"
	depends on SCSI && PROC_FS
	default y
comment "SCSI support type (disk, tape, CD-ROM)"
	depends on SCSI
config BLK_DEV_SD
	tristate "SCSI disk support"
	depends on SCSI
config CHR_DEV_ST
	tristate "SCSI tape support"
	depends on SCSI
config CHR_DEV_OSST
	tristate "SCSI OnStream SC-x0 tape support"
	depends on SCSI
config BLK_DEV_SR
	tristate "SCSI CDROM support"
	depends on SCSI
config BLK_DEV_SR_VENDOR
	bool "Enable vendor-specific extensions (for SCSI CDROM)"
	depends on BLK_DEV_SR
config CHR_DEV_SG
	tristate "SCSI generic support"
	depends on SCSI
config CHR_DEV_SCH
	tristate "SCSI media changer support"
	depends on SCSI
	
	  If you want to compile this as a module ( = code which can be
	  inserted in and removed from the running kernel whenever you want),
	  say M here and read <file:Documentation/kbuild/modules.txt> and
	  <file:Documentation/scsi/scsi.txt>. The module will be called ch.o.
	  If unsure, say N.
config SCSI_ENCLOSURE
	tristate "SCSI Enclosure Support"
	depends on SCSI && ENCLOSURE_SERVICES
config SCSI_CONSTANTS
	bool "Verbose SCSI error reporting (kernel size +=75K)"
	depends on SCSI
config SCSI_LOGGING
	bool "SCSI logging facility"
	depends on SCSI
config SCSI_SCAN_ASYNC
	bool "Asynchronous SCSI scanning"
	depends on SCSI
menu "SCSI Transports"
	depends on SCSI
config SCSI_SPI_ATTRS
	tristate "Parallel SCSI (SPI) Transport Attributes"
	depends on SCSI
config SCSI_FC_ATTRS
	tristate "FiberChannel Transport Attributes"
	depends on SCSI && NET
	select SCSI_NETLINK
config SCSI_ISCSI_ATTRS
	tristate "iSCSI Transport Attributes"
	depends on SCSI && NET
	select BLK_DEV_BSGLIB
config SCSI_SAS_ATTRS
	tristate "SAS Transport Attributes"
	depends on SCSI
	select BLK_DEV_BSG

	depends on SCSI
	select SCSI_SAS_ATTRS

	bool "ATA support for libsas (requires libata)"
	depends on SCSI_SAS_LIBSAS
	depends on ATA = y || ATA = SCSI_SAS_LIBSAS

	bool "Support for SMP interpretation for SAS hosts"
	default y
	depends on SCSI_SAS_LIBSAS
config SCSI_SRP_ATTRS
	tristate "SRP Transport Attributes"
	depends on SCSI
endmenu

	depends on SCSI!=n
	default y

	tristate "iSCSI Boot Sysfs Interface"
	default	n

	select BTREE
	default n

menuconfig MD
	bool "Multiple devices driver support (RAID and LVM)"
	depends on BLOCK
	select SRCU
if MD
config BLK_DEV_MD
	tristate "RAID support"
config MD_AUTODETECT
	bool "Autodetect RAID arrays during kernel boot"
	depends on BLK_DEV_MD=y
	default y
config MD_LINEAR
	tristate "Linear (append) mode"
	depends on BLK_DEV_MD
config MD_RAID0
	tristate "RAID-0 (striping) mode"
	depends on BLK_DEV_MD
config MD_RAID1
	tristate "RAID-1 (mirroring) mode"
	depends on BLK_DEV_MD
config MD_RAID10
	tristate "RAID-10 (mirrored striping) mode"
	depends on BLK_DEV_MD
config MD_RAID456
	tristate "RAID-4/RAID-5/RAID-6 mode"
	depends on BLK_DEV_MD
	select RAID6_PQ
	select ASYNC_MEMCPY
	select ASYNC_XOR
	select ASYNC_PQ
	select ASYNC_RAID6_RECOV
config MD_MULTIPATH
	tristate "Multipath I/O support"
	depends on BLK_DEV_MD
config MD_FAULTY
	tristate "Faulty test module for MD"
	depends on BLK_DEV_MD
config MD_CLUSTER
	tristate "Cluster Support for MD (EXPERIMENTAL)"
	depends on BLK_DEV_MD
	depends on DLM
	default n

config BCACHE
	tristate "Block device as cache"
config BCACHE_DEBUG

	depends on BCACHE

	bool "Debug closures"
	depends on BCACHE
	select DEBUG_FS
config BLK_DEV_DM_BUILTIN
	bool
config BLK_DEV_DM
	tristate "Device mapper support"
	select BLK_DEV_DM_BUILTIN
config DM_MQ_DEFAULT
	bool "request-based DM: use blk-mq I/O path by default"
	depends on BLK_DEV_DM
config DM_DEBUG
	bool "Device mapper debugging support"
	depends on BLK_DEV_DM
config DM_BUFIO
       tristate
       depends on BLK_DEV_DM
config DM_BIO_PRISON
       tristate
       depends on BLK_DEV_DM

       tristate

       select LIBCRC32C
       select DM_BUFIO

#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/drivers/macintosh/Kconfig
menuconfig MACINTOSH_DRIVERS
	bool "Macintosh device drivers"
	depends on PPC || MAC || X86
	default y if (PPC_PMAC || MAC)
if MACINTOSH_DRIVERS
config ADB
	bool "Apple Desktop Bus (ADB) support"
	depends on MAC || (PPC_PMAC && PPC32)
config ADB_MACII
	bool "Include Mac II ADB driver"
	depends on ADB && MAC
config ADB_MACIISI
	bool "Include Mac IIsi ADB driver"
	depends on ADB && MAC && BROKEN
config ADB_IOP
	bool "Include IOP (IIfx/Quadra 9x0) ADB driver"
	depends on ADB && MAC
config ADB_PMU68K
	bool "Include PMU (Powerbook) ADB driver"
	depends on ADB && MAC
config ADB_CUDA
	bool "Support for CUDA based Macs and PowerMacs"
	depends on (ADB || PPC_PMAC) && !PPC_PMAC64
config ADB_PMU
	bool "Support for PMU  based PowerMacs"
	depends on PPC_PMAC
config ADB_PMU_LED
	bool "Support for the Power/iBook front LED"
	depends on ADB_PMU
	select NEW_LEDS
	select LEDS_CLASS
config ADB_PMU_LED_IDE
	bool "Use front LED as IDE LED by default"
	depends on ADB_PMU_LED
	depends on LEDS_CLASS
	depends on IDE_GD_ATA
	select LEDS_TRIGGERS
	select LEDS_TRIGGER_IDE_DISK
config PMAC_SMU
	bool "Support for SMU  based PowerMacs"
	depends on PPC_PMAC64
config PMAC_APM_EMU
	tristate "APM emulation"
	select APM_EMULATION
	depends on ADB_PMU && PM && PPC32
config PMAC_MEDIABAY
	bool "Support PowerBook hotswap media bay"
	depends on PPC_PMAC && PPC32 && BLOCK
config PMAC_BACKLIGHT
	bool "Backlight control for LCD screens"
	depends on ADB_PMU && FB = y && (BROKEN || !PPC64)
	select FB_BACKLIGHT
config PMAC_BACKLIGHT_LEGACY
	bool "Provide legacy ioctl's on /dev/pmu for the backlight"
	depends on PMAC_BACKLIGHT && (BROKEN || !PPC64)
config ADB_MACIO
	bool "Include MacIO (CHRP) ADB driver"
	depends on ADB && PPC_CHRP && !PPC_PMAC64
config INPUT_ADBHID
	bool "Support for ADB input devices (keyboard, mice, ...)"
	depends on ADB && INPUT=y
config MAC_EMUMOUSEBTN
	tristate "Support for mouse button 2+3 emulation"
	depends on SYSCTL && INPUT
config THERM_WINDTUNNEL
	tristate "Support for thermal management on Windtunnel G4s"
	depends on I2C && I2C_POWERMAC && PPC_PMAC && !PPC_PMAC64
config THERM_ADT746X
	tristate "Support for thermal mgmnt on laptops with ADT 746x chipset"
	depends on I2C && I2C_POWERMAC && PPC_PMAC && !PPC_PMAC64
config WINDFARM
	tristate "New PowerMac thermal control infrastructure"
	depends on PPC
config WINDFARM_PM81
	tristate "Support for thermal management on iMac G5"
	depends on WINDFARM && I2C && CPU_FREQ_PMAC64 && PMAC_SMU
	select I2C_POWERMAC
config WINDFARM_PM72
	tristate "Support for thermal management on PowerMac G5 (AGP)"
	depends on WINDFARM && I2C && CPU_FREQ_PMAC64 && ADB_PMU
	select I2C_POWERMAC
config WINDFARM_RM31
	tristate "Support for thermal management on Xserve G5"
	depends on WINDFARM && I2C && CPU_FREQ_PMAC64 && ADB_PMU
	select I2C_POWERMAC
config WINDFARM_PM91
	tristate "Support for thermal management on PowerMac9,1"
	depends on WINDFARM && I2C && CPU_FREQ_PMAC64 && PMAC_SMU
	select I2C_POWERMAC
config WINDFARM_PM112
	tristate "Support for thermal management on PowerMac11,2"
	depends on WINDFARM && I2C && PMAC_SMU
	select I2C_POWERMAC
config WINDFARM_PM121
	tristate "Support for thermal management on PowerMac12,1"
	depends on WINDFARM && I2C && PMAC_SMU
	select I2C_POWERMAC
config ANSLCD
	tristate "Support for ANS LCD display"
	depends on ADB_CUDA && PPC_PMAC
config PMAC_RACKMETER
	tristate "Support for Apple XServe front panel LEDs"
	depends on PPC_PMAC
config SENSORS_AMS
	tristate "Apple Motion Sensor driver"
	depends on PPC_PMAC && !PPC64 && INPUT && ((ADB_PMU && I2C = y) || (ADB_PMU && !I2C) || I2C)
	select INPUT_POLLDEV
config SENSORS_AMS_PMU
	bool "PMU variant"
	depends on SENSORS_AMS && ADB_PMU
	default y
config SENSORS_AMS_I2C
	bool "I2C variant"
	depends on SENSORS_AMS && I2C
	default y
endif

	tristate

#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/drivers/net/ethernet/amd/Kconfig
config NET_VENDOR_AMD
	bool "AMD devices"
	default y
	depends on DIO || MACH_DECSTATION || MVME147 || ATARI || SUN3 || \
		   SUN3X || SBUS || PCI || ZORRO || (ISA && ISA_DMA_API) || \
		   (ARM && ARCH_EBSA110) || ISA || EISA || PCMCIA || ARM64
if NET_VENDOR_AMD
config A2065
	tristate "A2065 support"
	depends on ZORRO
	select CRC32
config AMD8111_ETH
	tristate "AMD 8111 (new PCI LANCE) support"
	depends on PCI
	select CRC32
	select MII
config LANCE
	tristate "AMD LANCE and PCnet (AT1500 and NE2100) support"
	depends on ISA && ISA_DMA_API && !ARM
config PCNET32
	tristate "AMD PCnet32 PCI support"
	depends on PCI
	select CRC32
	select MII
config ARIADNE
	tristate "Ariadne support"
	depends on ZORRO
config ARM_AM79C961A
	bool "ARM EBSA110 AM79C961A support"
	depends on ARM && ARCH_EBSA110
	select CRC32
config ATARILANCE
	tristate "Atari LANCE support"
	depends on ATARI
config DECLANCE
	tristate "DEC LANCE ethernet controller support"
	depends on MACH_DECSTATION
	select CRC32
config HPLANCE
	bool "HP on-board LANCE support"
	depends on DIO
	select CRC32
config MIPS_AU1X00_ENET
	tristate "MIPS AU1000 Ethernet support"
	depends on MIPS_ALCHEMY
	select PHYLIB
	select CRC32
config MVME147_NET
	tristate "MVME147 (LANCE) Ethernet support"
	depends on MVME147
	select CRC32
config PCMCIA_NMCLAN
	tristate "New Media PCMCIA support"
	depends on PCMCIA
config NI65
	tristate "NI6510 support"
	depends on ISA && ISA_DMA_API && !ARM
config SUN3LANCE
	tristate "Sun3/Sun3x on-board LANCE support"
	depends on (SUN3 || SUN3X)
config SUNLANCE
	tristate "Sun LANCE support"
	depends on SBUS
	select CRC32
config AMD_XGBE
	tristate "AMD 10GbE Ethernet driver"
	depends on (OF_NET || ACPI) && HAS_IOMEM && HAS_DMA
	depends on ARM64 || COMPILE_TEST
	select PHYLIB
	select AMD_XGBE_PHY
	select BITREVERSE
	select CRC32
	select PTP_1588_CLOCK
config AMD_XGBE_DCB
	bool "Data Center Bridging (DCB) support"
	default n
	depends on AMD_XGBE && DCB
endif

#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/drivers/net/ethernet/adi/Kconfig
config NET_BFIN
	bool "Blackfin devices"
	depends on BF516 || BF518 || BF526 || BF527 || BF536 || BF537
if NET_BFIN
config BFIN_MAC
	tristate "Blackfin on-chip MAC support"
	depends on (BF516 || BF518 || BF526 || BF527 || BF536 || BF537)
	select CRC32
	select MII
	select PHYLIB
	select BFIN_MAC_USE_L1 if DMA_UNCACHED_NONE
config BFIN_MAC_USE_L1
	bool "Use L1 memory for rx/tx packets"
	depends on BFIN_MAC && (BF527 || BF537)
	default y
config BFIN_TX_DESC_NUM
	int "Number of transmit buffer packets"
	depends on BFIN_MAC
	range 6 10 if BFIN_MAC_USE_L1
	range 10 100
	default "10"
config BFIN_RX_DESC_NUM
	int "Number of receive buffer packets"
	depends on BFIN_MAC
	range 20 64
	default "20"
config BFIN_MAC_USE_HWSTAMP
	bool "Use IEEE 1588 hwstamp"
	depends on BFIN_MAC && BF518
	select PTP_1588_CLOCK
	default y
endif

	default y

	depends on B44 && SSB_PCIHOST_POSSIBLE
	select SSB_PCIHOST
	default y

	bool
	depends on B44 && SSB_DRIVER_PCICORE_POSSIBLE
	select SSB_DRIVER_PCICORE
	default y

	bool
	depends on B44_PCI_AUTOSELECT && B44_PCICORE_AUTOSELECT
	default y

	tristate "Broadcom 63xx internal mac support"
	depends on BCM63XX
	select MII
	select PHYLIB

	tristate "Broadcom GENET internal MAC support"

	select CRC32
	select FW_LOADER

	tristate "QLogic CNIC support"
	depends on PCI && (IPV6 || IPV6=n)
	select BNX2
	select UIO

	tristate "SB1250 Gigabit Ethernet support"
	depends on SIBYTE_SB1xxx_SOC
	select PHYLIB

	depends on PCI
	select PHYLIB
	select HWMON
	select PTP_1588_CLOCK

	select PTP_1588_CLOCK
	select FW_LOADER
	select ZLIB_INFLATE
	select LIBCRC32C
	select MDIO

	depends on BNX2X && PCI_IOV
	default y
config BGMAC
	tristate "BCMA bus GBit core support"
	depends on BCMA_HOST_SOC && HAS_DMA && (BCM47XX || ARCH_BCM_5301X)
	select PHYLIB
config SYSTEMPORT
	tristate "Broadcom SYSTEMPORT internal MAC support"
	depends on OF
	select MII
	select PHYLIB
	select FIXED_PHY
endif

	tristate "FEC ethernet controller (of ColdFire and some i.MX CPUs)"
	depends on (M523x || M527x || M5272 || M528x || M520x || M532x || \
		   ARCH_MXC || SOC_IMX28)

#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/drivers/net/ethernet/freescale/fs_enet/Kconfig
config FS_ENET
       tristate "Freescale Ethernet Driver"
       depends on NET_VENDOR_FREESCALE && (CPM1 || CPM2 || PPC_MPC512x)
       select MII
       select PHYLIB
config FS_ENET_MPC5121_FEC
	def_bool y if (FS_ENET && PPC_MPC512x)
	select FS_ENET_HAS_FEC
config FS_ENET_HAS_SCC
	bool "Chip has an SCC usable for ethernet"
	depends on FS_ENET && (CPM1 || CPM2)
	default y
config FS_ENET_HAS_FCC
	bool "Chip has an FCC usable for ethernet"
	depends on FS_ENET && CPM2
	default y
config FS_ENET_HAS_FEC
	bool "Chip has an FEC usable for ethernet"
	depends on FS_ENET && (CPM1 || FS_ENET_MPC5121_FEC)
	select FS_ENET_MDIO_FEC
	default y
config FS_ENET_MDIO_FEC
	tristate "MDIO driver for FEC"
	depends on FS_ENET && (CPM1 || FS_ENET_MPC5121_FEC)
config FS_ENET_MDIO_FCC
	tristate "MDIO driver for FCC"
	depends on FS_ENET && CPM2
	select MDIO_BITBANG
config FSL_PQ_MDIO
	tristate "Freescale PQ MDIO"
	select PHYLIB
config FSL_XGMAC_MDIO
	tristate "Freescale XGMAC MDIO"
	select PHYLIB
	select OF_MDIO
config UCC_GETH
	tristate "Freescale QE Gigabit Ethernet"
	depends on QUICC_ENGINE
	select FSL_PQ_MDIO
	select PHYLIB
config UGETH_TX_ON_DEMAND
	bool "Transmit on Demand support"
	depends on UCC_GETH
config GIANFAR
	tristate "Gianfar Ethernet"
	depends on FSL_SOC
	select FSL_PQ_MDIO
	select PHYLIB
	select CRC32
endif

	select CRC32

	depends on IBM_EMAC
	default "128"

	int "Number of transmit buffers"
	depends on IBM_EMAC
	default "64"
config IBM_EMAC_POLL_WEIGHT
	int "MAL NAPI polling weight"
	depends on IBM_EMAC
	default "32"
config IBM_EMAC_RX_COPY_THRESHOLD
	int "RX skb copy threshold (bytes)"
	depends on IBM_EMAC
	default "256"
config IBM_EMAC_RX_SKB_HEADROOM
	int "Additional RX skb headroom (bytes)"
	depends on IBM_EMAC
	default "0"
config IBM_EMAC_DEBUG
	bool "Debugging"
	depends on IBM_EMAC
	default n
config IBM_EMAC_ZMII
	bool
	default n
config IBM_EMAC_RGMII
	bool
	default n
config IBM_EMAC_TAH
	bool
	default n
config IBM_EMAC_EMAC4
	bool
	default n
config IBM_EMAC_NO_FLOW_CTRL
	bool
	default n
config IBM_EMAC_MAL_CLR_ICINTSTAT
	bool
	default n
config IBM_EMAC_MAL_COMMON_ERR
	bool
	default n
config EHEA
	tristate "eHEA Ethernet support"
	depends on IBMEBUS && SPARSEMEM
endif

config NET_VENDOR_INTEL
	bool "Intel devices"
	default y
if NET_VENDOR_INTEL
config E100
	tristate "Intel(R) PRO/100+ support"
	depends on PCI
	select MII
config E1000
	tristate "Intel(R) PRO/1000 Gigabit Ethernet support"
	depends on PCI
config E1000E
	tristate "Intel(R) PRO/1000 PCI-Express Gigabit Ethernet support"
	depends on PCI && (!SPARC32 || BROKEN)
	select CRC32
	select PTP_1588_CLOCK
config IGB
	tristate "Intel(R) 82575/82576 PCI-Express Gigabit Ethernet support"
	depends on PCI
	select PTP_1588_CLOCK
	select I2C
	select I2C_ALGOBIT
config IGB_HWMON
	bool "Intel(R) PCI-Express Gigabit adapters HWMON support"
	default y
	depends on IGB && HWMON && !(IGB=y && HWMON=m)
config IGB_DCA
	bool "Direct Cache Access (DCA) Support"
	default y
	depends on IGB && DCA && !(IGB=y && DCA=m)
config IGBVF
	tristate "Intel(R) 82576 Virtual Function Ethernet support"
	depends on PCI
config IXGB
	tristate "Intel(R) PRO/10GbE support"
	depends on PCI
config IXGBE
	tristate "Intel(R) 10GbE PCI Express adapters support"
	depends on PCI
	select MDIO
	select PTP_1588_CLOCK
config IXGBE_VXLAN
	bool "Virtual eXtensible Local Area Network Support"
	default n
	depends on IXGBE && VXLAN && !(IXGBE=y && VXLAN=m)
config IXGBE_HWMON
	bool "Intel(R) 10GbE PCI Express adapters HWMON support"
	default y
	depends on IXGBE && HWMON && !(IXGBE=y && HWMON=m)
config IXGBE_DCA
	bool "Direct Cache Access (DCA) Support"
	default y
	depends on IXGBE && DCA && !(IXGBE=y && DCA=m)
config IXGBE_DCB
	bool "Data Center Bridging (DCB) Support"
	default n
	depends on IXGBE && DCB
config IXGBEVF
	tristate "Intel(R) 10GbE PCI Express Virtual Function Ethernet support"
	depends on PCI_MSI
config I40E
	tristate "Intel(R) Ethernet Controller XL710 Family support"
	select PTP_1588_CLOCK
	depends on PCI
config I40E_VXLAN
	bool "Virtual eXtensible Local Area Network Support"
	default n
	depends on I40E && VXLAN && !(I40E=y && VXLAN=m)
config I40E_DCB
	bool "Data Center Bridging (DCB) Support"
	default n
	depends on I40E && DCB
config I40E_FCOE
	bool "Fibre Channel over Ethernet (FCoE)"
	default n
	depends on I40E && DCB && FCOE
config I40EVF
	tristate "Intel(R) XL710 X710 Virtual Function Ethernet support"
	depends on PCI_MSI
config FM10K
	tristate "Intel(R) FM10000 Ethernet Switch Host Interface Support"
	default n
	depends on PCI_MSI
	select PTP_1588_CLOCK
config FM10K_VXLAN
	bool "Virtual eXtensible Local Area Network Support"
	default n
	depends on FM10K && VXLAN && !(FM10K=y && VXLAN=m)
endif

	select SLHC

	depends on PPP

	tristate "PPP Deflate compression"
	depends on PPP

	select ZLIB_DEFLATE

	bool "PPP filtering"
	depends on PPP

	depends on PPP
	select CRYPTO
	select CRYPTO_SHA1
	select CRYPTO_ARC4
	select CRYPTO_ECB

	depends on PPP

	tristate "PPP over ATM"
	depends on ATM && PPP
config PPPOE
	tristate "PPP over Ethernet"
	depends on PPP
config PPTP
	tristate "PPP over IPv4 (PPTP)"
	depends on PPP && NET_IPGRE_DEMUX
config PPPOL2TP
	tristate "PPP over L2TP"
	depends on L2TP && PPP

	depends on PPP
	select CRC_CCITT

	tristate "PPP support for sync tty ports"
	depends on PPP
endif 
endif

	tristate

#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/drivers/s390/net/Kconfig
menu "S/390 network device drivers"
	depends on NETDEVICES && S390
config LCS
	def_tristate m
	prompt "Lan Channel Station Interface"
	depends on CCW && NETDEVICES && (ETHERNET || FDDI)
config CTCM
	def_tristate m
	prompt "CTC and MPC SNA device support"
	depends on CCW && NETDEVICES
config NETIUCV
	def_tristate m
	prompt "IUCV network device support (VM only)"
	depends on IUCV && NETDEVICES
config SMSGIUCV
	def_tristate m
	prompt "IUCV special message support (VM only)"
	depends on IUCV
config SMSGIUCV_EVENT
	def_tristate m
	prompt "Deliver IUCV special messages as uevents (VM only)"
	depends on SMSGIUCV
config QETH
	def_tristate y
	prompt "Gigabit Ethernet device support"
	depends on CCW && NETDEVICES && IP_MULTICAST && QDIO && ETHERNET
	
	  For details please refer to the documentation provided by IBM at
	  <http://www.ibm.com/developerworks/linux/linux390>
	  To compile this driver as a module, choose M.
	  The module name is qeth.
config QETH_L2
	def_tristate y
	prompt "qeth layer 2 device support"
	depends on QETH
config QETH_L3
	def_tristate y
	prompt "qeth layer 3 device support"
	depends on QETH
config QETH_IPV6
	def_bool y if (QETH_L3 = IPV6) || (QETH_L3 && IPV6 = 'y')
config CCWGROUP
	tristate
	default (LCS || CTCM || QETH)
endmenu
#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/drivers/net/usb/Kconfig
comment "Host-side USB support is needed for USB Network Adapter support"
	depends on !USB && NET
menuconfig USB_NET_DRIVERS
	tristate "USB Network Adapters"
	default USB if USB
	depends on USB && NET
if USB_NET_DRIVERS
config USB_CATC
	tristate "USB CATC NetMate-based Ethernet device support"
	select CRC32
config USB_KAWETH
	tristate "USB KLSI KL5USB101-based ethernet device support"

config ATH5K
	tristate "Atheros 5xxx wireless cards support"
	depends on (PCI || ATH25) && MAC80211

	select LEDS_CLASS
	select NEW_LEDS
	select AVERAGE

	select ATH5K_PCI if !ATH25

	depends on ATH5K

	bool "Atheros 5xxx tracer"
	depends on ATH5K
	depends on EVENT_TRACING

	depends on ATH25

	depends on (!ATH25 && PCI)

	depends on ATH5K && CFG80211_CERTIFICATION_ONUS

#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/drivers/net/wireless/b43/Kconfig
config B43
	tristate "Broadcom 43xx wireless support (mac80211 stack)"
	depends on (BCMA_POSSIBLE || SSB_POSSIBLE) && MAC80211 && HAS_DMA
	select BCMA if B43_BCMA
	select SSB if B43_SSB
	select FW_LOADER
config B43_BCMA
	bool
config B43_SSB
	bool
choice
	prompt "Supported bus types"
	depends on B43
	default B43_BUSES_BCMA_AND_SSB
config B43_BUSES_BCMA_AND_SSB
	bool "BCMA and SSB"
	depends on BCMA_POSSIBLE && SSB_POSSIBLE
	select B43_BCMA
	select B43_SSB
config B43_BUSES_BCMA
	bool "BCMA only"
	depends on BCMA_POSSIBLE
	select B43_BCMA
config B43_BUSES_SSB
	bool "SSB only"
	depends on SSB_POSSIBLE
	select B43_SSB
endchoice
config B43_PCI_AUTOSELECT
	bool
	depends on B43 && SSB_PCIHOST_POSSIBLE
	select SSB_PCIHOST
	select SSB_B43_PCI_BRIDGE
	default y
config B43_PCICORE_AUTOSELECT
	bool
	depends on B43 && SSB_DRIVER_PCICORE_POSSIBLE
	select SSB_DRIVER_PCICORE
	default y
config B43_PCMCIA
	bool "Broadcom 43xx PCMCIA device support"
	depends on B43 && B43_SSB && SSB_PCMCIAHOST_POSSIBLE
	select SSB_PCMCIAHOST
config B43_SDIO
	bool "Broadcom 43xx SDIO device support"
	depends on B43 && B43_SSB && SSB_SDIOHOST_POSSIBLE
	select SSB_SDIOHOST
config B43_BCMA_PIO
	bool
	depends on B43 && B43_BCMA
	select BCMA_BLOCKIO
	default y
config B43_PIO
	bool
	depends on B43 && B43_SSB
	select SSB_BLOCKIO
	default y
config B43_PHY_G
	bool "Support for G-PHY (802.11g) devices"
	depends on B43 && B43_SSB
	default y
config B43_PHY_N
	bool "Support for N-PHY (the main 802.11n series) devices"
	depends on B43
	default y
config B43_PHY_LP
	bool "Support for LP-PHY (low-power 802.11g) devices"
	depends on B43 && B43_SSB
	default y
config B43_PHY_HT
	bool "Support for HT-PHY (high throughput 802.11n) devices"
	depends on B43 && B43_BCMA
	default y
config B43_PHY_LCN
	bool "Support for LCN-PHY devices (BROKEN)"
	depends on B43 && BROKEN
config B43_PHY_AC
	bool "Support for AC-PHY (802.11ac) devices (BROKEN)"
	depends on B43 && B43_BCMA && BROKEN
config B43_LEDS
	bool
	depends on B43 && MAC80211_LEDS && (LEDS_CLASS = y || LEDS_CLASS = B43)
	default y
config B43_HWRNG
	bool
	depends on B43 && (HW_RANDOM = y || HW_RANDOM = B43)
	default y
config B43_DEBUG
	bool "Broadcom 43xx debugging"
	depends on B43
#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/drivers/net/wireless/b43legacy/Kconfig
config B43LEGACY
	tristate "Broadcom 43xx-legacy wireless support (mac80211 stack)"
	depends on SSB_POSSIBLE && MAC80211 && HAS_DMA
	select SSB
	select FW_LOADER
config B43LEGACY_PCI_AUTOSELECT
	bool
	depends on B43LEGACY && SSB_PCIHOST_POSSIBLE
	select SSB_PCIHOST
	select SSB_B43_PCI_BRIDGE
	default y
config B43LEGACY_PCICORE_AUTOSELECT
	bool
	depends on B43LEGACY && SSB_DRIVER_PCICORE_POSSIBLE
	select SSB_DRIVER_PCICORE
	default y
config B43LEGACY_LEDS
	bool
	depends on B43LEGACY && MAC80211_LEDS && (LEDS_CLASS = y || LEDS_CLASS = B43LEGACY)
	default y
config B43LEGACY_HWRNG
	bool
	depends on B43LEGACY && (HW_RANDOM = y || HW_RANDOM = B43LEGACY)
	default y
config B43LEGACY_DEBUG
	bool "Broadcom 43xx-legacy debugging"
	depends on B43LEGACY
	default y
config B43LEGACY_DMA
	bool
	depends on B43LEGACY
config B43LEGACY_PIO
	bool
	depends on B43LEGACY
choice
	prompt "Broadcom 43xx-legacy data transfer mode"
	depends on B43LEGACY
	default B43LEGACY_DMA_AND_PIO_MODE
config B43LEGACY_DMA_AND_PIO_MODE
	bool "DMA + PIO"
	select B43LEGACY_DMA
	select B43LEGACY_PIO
config B43LEGACY_DMA_MODE
	bool "DMA (Direct Memory Access) only"
	select B43LEGACY_DMA
config B43LEGACY_PIO_MODE
	bool "PIO (Programmed I/O) only"
	select B43LEGACY_PIO
endchoice
#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/drivers/net/wireless/brcm80211/Kconfig
config BRCMUTIL
	tristate
config BRCMSMAC
	tristate "Broadcom IEEE802.11n PCIe SoftMAC WLAN driver"
	depends on MAC80211
	depends on BCMA_POSSIBLE
	select BCMA
	select NEW_LEDS if BCMA_DRIVER_GPIO
	select LEDS_CLASS if BCMA_DRIVER_GPIO
	select BRCMUTIL
	select FW_LOADER
	select CORDIC
config BRCMFMAC
	tristate "Broadcom IEEE802.11n embedded FullMAC WLAN driver"
	depends on CFG80211
	select BRCMUTIL
config BRCMFMAC_PROTO_BCDC
	bool
config BRCMFMAC_PROTO_MSGBUF
	bool
config BRCMFMAC_SDIO
	bool "SDIO bus interface support for FullMAC driver"
	depends on (MMC = y || MMC = BRCMFMAC)
	depends on BRCMFMAC
	select BRCMFMAC_PROTO_BCDC
	select FW_LOADER
	default y
config BRCMFMAC_USB
	bool "USB bus interface support for FullMAC driver"
	depends on (USB = y || USB = BRCMFMAC)
	depends on BRCMFMAC
	select BRCMFMAC_PROTO_BCDC
	select FW_LOADER
config BRCMFMAC_PCIE
	bool "PCIE bus interface support for FullMAC driver"
	depends on BRCMFMAC
	depends on PCI
	depends on HAS_DMA
	select BRCMFMAC_PROTO_MSGBUF
	select FW_LOADER
config BRCM_TRACING
	bool "Broadcom device tracing"
	depends on BRCMSMAC || BRCMFMAC
config BRCMDBG
	bool "Broadcom driver debug functions"
	depends on BRCMSMAC || BRCMFMAC

            % echo 1 > /sys/bus/pci/drivers/ipw2200/*/rtap_iface

menuconfig WAN
	bool "Wan interfaces support"
if WAN
config HOSTESS_SV11
	tristate "Comtrol Hostess SV-11 support"
	depends on ISA && m && ISA_DMA_API && INET && HDLC && VIRT_TO_BUS
config COSA
	tristate "COSA/SRP sync serial boards support"
	depends on ISA && m && ISA_DMA_API && HDLC && VIRT_TO_BUS

	tristate "LanMedia Corp. SSI/V.35, T1/E1, HSSI, T3 boards"
	depends on PCI && VIRT_TO_BUS && HDLC
config SEALEVEL_4021
	tristate "Sealevel Systems 4021 support"
	depends on ISA && m && ISA_DMA_API && INET && HDLC && VIRT_TO_BUS
config HDLC
	tristate "Generic HDLC layer"
config HDLC_RAW
	tristate "Raw HDLC support"
	depends on HDLC
config HDLC_RAW_ETH
	tristate "Raw HDLC Ethernet device support"
	depends on HDLC
config HDLC_CISCO
	tristate "Cisco HDLC support"
	depends on HDLC
config HDLC_FR
	tristate "Frame Relay support"
	depends on HDLC
config HDLC_PPP
	tristate "Synchronous Point-to-Point Protocol (PPP) support"
	depends on HDLC
config HDLC_X25
	tristate "X.25 protocol support"
	depends on HDLC && (LAPB=m && HDLC=m || LAPB=y)
comment "X.25/LAPB support is disabled"
	depends on HDLC && (LAPB!=m || HDLC!=m) && LAPB!=y
config PCI200SYN
	tristate "Goramo PCI200SYN support"
	depends on HDLC && PCI
config WANXL
	tristate "SBE Inc. wanXL support"
	depends on HDLC && PCI
config WANXL_BUILD_FIRMWARE
	bool "rebuild wanXL firmware"
	depends on WANXL && !PREVENT_FIRMWARE_BUILD
config PC300TOO
	tristate "Cyclades PC300 RSV/X21 alternative support"
	depends on HDLC && PCI
config N2
	tristate "SDL RISCom/N2 support"
	depends on HDLC && ISA
config C101
	tristate "Moxa C101 support"
	depends on HDLC && ISA
config FARSYNC
	tristate "FarSync T-Series support"
	depends on HDLC && PCI

	tristate "Etinc PCISYNC serial board support"
	depends on HDLC && PCI && m
config DSCC4_PCISYNC
	bool "Etinc PCISYNC features"
	depends on DSCC4
config DSCC4_PCI_RST
	bool "Hard reset support"
	depends on DSCC4
config IXP4XX_HSS
	tristate "Intel IXP4xx HSS (synchronous serial port) support"
	depends on HDLC && ARM && ARCH_IXP4XX && IXP4XX_NPE && IXP4XX_QMGR
config DLCI
	tristate "Frame Relay DLCI support"
config DLCI_MAX
	int "Max DLCI per device"
	depends on DLCI
	default "8"
config SDLA
	tristate "SDLA (Sangoma S502/S508) support"
	depends on DLCI && ISA
config LAPBETHER
	tristate "LAPB over Ethernet driver"
	depends on LAPB && X25
config X25_ASY
	tristate "X.25 async driver"
	depends on LAPB && X25 && TTY
config SBNI
	tristate "Granch SBNI12 Leased Line adapter support"
	depends on X86
config SBNI_MULTILINE
	bool "Multiple line feature support"
	depends on SBNI

	depends on ARCH_TEGRA && OF
	select INPUT_MATRIXKMAP

	tristate "OpenCores Keyboard Controller"
	depends on HAS_IOMEM

	depends on PXA27x || PXA3xx || ARCH_MMP
	select INPUT_MATRIXKMAP

	depends on CPU_PXA930 || CPU_PXA935

	tristate "Qualcomm PMIC8XXX keypad support"
	depends on MFD_PM8XXX
	select INPUT_MATRIXKMAP

	depends on HAVE_CLK
	select INPUT_MATRIXKMAP

	tristate "Generic Input Event device for Goldfish"

	select SERIO

	select SERIO

	depends on SUPERH || ARCH_SHMOBILE || COMPILE_TEST

	depends on MFD_STMPE
	depends on OF
	select INPUT_MATRIXKMAP

	tristate "Allwinner sun4i low res adc attached tablet keys support"
	depends on ARCH_SUNXI
config KEYBOARD_DAVINCI
	tristate "TI DaVinci Key Scan"
	depends on ARCH_DAVINCI_DM365
config KEYBOARD_IPAQ_MICRO
	tristate "Buttons on Micro SoC (iPaq h3100,h3600,h3700)"
	depends on MFD_IPAQ_MICRO

	tristate "TI OMAP keypad support"
	depends on ARCH_OMAP1
	select INPUT_MATRIXKMAP

	select INPUT_MATRIXKMAP

	depends on MFD_TC3589X
	select INPUT_MATRIXKMAP

	depends on ARCH_W90X900

	select INPUT_MATRIXKMAP

	select REGMAP_I2C

menuconfig INPUT_MOUSE
	bool "Mice"
	default y
if INPUT_MOUSE
config MOUSE_PS2
	tristate "PS/2 mouse"
	default y
	select SERIO
	select SERIO_LIBPS2
	select SERIO_I8042 if ARCH_MIGHT_HAVE_PC_SERIO
	select SERIO_GSCPS2 if GSC
config MOUSE_PS2_ALPS
	bool "ALPS PS/2 mouse protocol extension" if EXPERT
	default y
	depends on MOUSE_PS2
config MOUSE_PS2_LOGIPS2PP
	bool "Logitech PS/2++ mouse protocol extension" if EXPERT
	default y
	depends on MOUSE_PS2
config MOUSE_PS2_SYNAPTICS
	bool "Synaptics PS/2 mouse protocol extension" if EXPERT
	default y
	depends on MOUSE_PS2
config MOUSE_PS2_CYPRESS
       bool "Cypress PS/2 mouse protocol extension" if EXPERT
       default y
       depends on MOUSE_PS2

	default y
	depends on MOUSE_PS2 && X86 && DMI

	bool "IBM Trackpoint PS/2 mouse protocol extension" if EXPERT
	default y
	depends on MOUSE_PS2

	depends on MOUSE_PS2

	bool "OLPC PS/2 mouse protocol extension"
	depends on MOUSE_PS2 && OLPC

	default y
	depends on MOUSE_PS2

	depends on MOUSE_PS2 && X86 && HYPERVISOR_GUEST

	select SERIO

	select USB

	depends on MOUSE_ELAN_I2C

	tristate "InPort/MS/ATIXL busmouse"
	depends on ISA

	bool "ATI XL variant"
	depends on MOUSE_INPORT
config MOUSE_LOGIBM
	tristate "Logitech busmouse"
	depends on ISA

	tristate "IBM PC110 touchpad"
	depends on ISA

	tristate "Amiga mouse"
	depends on AMIGA

	depends on ARCH_ACORN

	tristate "DEC VSXXX-AA/GA mouse and VSXXX-AB tablet"
	select SERIO

	tristate "GPIO mouse"
	depends on GPIOLIB
	select INPUT_POLLDEV

	depends on CPU_PXA930 || CPU_PXA935
config MOUSE_MAPLE
	tristate "Maple mouse (for the Dreamcast)"
	depends on MAPLE

#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/drivers/tty/Kconfig
config TTY
	bool "Enable TTY" if EXPERT
	default y
if TTY
config VT
	bool "Virtual terminal" if EXPERT
	depends on !S390 && !UML
	select INPUT
	default y
config CONSOLE_TRANSLATIONS
	depends on VT
	default y
	bool "Enable character translations in console" if EXPERT
config VT_CONSOLE
	bool "Support for console on virtual terminal" if EXPERT
	depends on VT
	default y
config VT_CONSOLE_SLEEP
	def_bool y
	depends on VT_CONSOLE && PM_SLEEP
config HW_CONSOLE
	bool
	depends on VT && !UML
	default y
config VT_HW_CONSOLE_BINDING
       bool "Support for binding and unbinding console drivers"
       depends on HW_CONSOLE
       default n
config UNIX98_PTYS
	bool "Unix98 PTY support" if EXPERT
	default y
config DEVPTS_MULTIPLE_INSTANCES
	bool "Support multiple instances of devpts"
	depends on UNIX98_PTYS
	default n
config LEGACY_PTYS
	bool "Legacy (BSD) PTY support"
	default y
config LEGACY_PTY_COUNT
	int "Maximum number of legacy PTY in use"
	depends on LEGACY_PTYS
	range 0 256
	default "256"
config BFIN_JTAG_COMM
	tristate "Blackfin JTAG Communication"
	depends on BLACKFIN
config BFIN_JTAG_COMM_CONSOLE
	bool "Console on Blackfin JTAG"
	depends on BFIN_JTAG_COMM=y

	bool "Non-standard serial port support"
	depends on HAS_IOMEM
config ROCKETPORT
	tristate "Comtrol RocketPort support"
	depends on SERIAL_NONSTANDARD && (ISA || EISA || PCI)
config CYCLADES
	tristate "Cyclades async mux support"
	depends on SERIAL_NONSTANDARD && (PCI || ISA)
	select FW_LOADER
config CYZ_INTR
	bool "Cyclades-Z interrupt mode operation"
	depends on CYCLADES
config MOXA_INTELLIO
	tristate "Moxa Intellio support"
	depends on SERIAL_NONSTANDARD && (ISA || EISA || PCI)
	select FW_LOADER

	depends on SERIAL_NONSTANDARD && (PCI || EISA || ISA)

	depends on SERIAL_NONSTANDARD && PCI && ISA_DMA_API
config SYNCLINKMP
	tristate "SyncLink Multiport support"
	depends on SERIAL_NONSTANDARD && PCI

	tristate "SyncLink GT/AC support"
	depends on SERIAL_NONSTANDARD && PCI

	depends on PCI

	depends on SERIAL_NONSTANDARD && PCI
	select FW_LOADER

	depends on SERIAL_NONSTANDARD
config N_GSM
	tristate "GSM MUX line discipline support (EXPERIMENTAL)"
	depends on NET

	depends on TRACE_SINK
	default n
config TRACE_SINK
	tristate "Trace data sink for MIPI P1149.7 cJTAG standard"
	default n

	depends on PPC_EARLY_DEBUG_EHV_BC

	depends on GOLDFISH

menu "Serial drivers"
	depends on HAS_IOMEM
config SERIAL_EARLYCON
	bool
#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/drivers/tty/serial/8250/Kconfig
config SERIAL_8250
	tristate "8250/16550 and compatible serial support"
	select SERIAL_CORE
config SERIAL_8250_DEPRECATED_OPTIONS
	bool "Support 8250_core.* kernel options (DEPRECATED)"
	depends on SERIAL_8250
	default y
config SERIAL_8250_PNP
	bool "8250/16550 PNP device support" if EXPERT
	depends on SERIAL_8250 && PNP
	default y
config SERIAL_8250_CONSOLE
	bool "Console on 8250/16550 and compatible serial port"
	depends on SERIAL_8250=y
	select SERIAL_CORE_CONSOLE
	select SERIAL_EARLYCON
config SERIAL_8250_GSC
	tristate
	depends on SERIAL_8250 && GSC
	default SERIAL_8250
config SERIAL_8250_DMA
	bool "DMA support for 16550 compatible UART controllers" if EXPERT
	depends on SERIAL_8250 && DMADEVICES=y
	default SERIAL_8250
config SERIAL_8250_PCI
	tristate "8250/16550 PCI device support" if EXPERT
	depends on SERIAL_8250 && PCI
	default SERIAL_8250
	select RATIONAL
config SERIAL_8250_HP300
	tristate
	depends on SERIAL_8250 && HP300
	default SERIAL_8250
config SERIAL_8250_CS
	tristate "8250/16550 PCMCIA device support"
	depends on PCMCIA && SERIAL_8250
config SERIAL_8250_NR_UARTS
	int "Maximum number of 8250/16550 serial ports"
	depends on SERIAL_8250
	default "4"
config SERIAL_8250_RUNTIME_UARTS
	int "Number of 8250/16550 serial ports to register at runtime"
	depends on SERIAL_8250
	range 0 SERIAL_8250_NR_UARTS
	default "4"
config SERIAL_8250_EXTENDED
	bool "Extended 8250/16550 serial driver options"
	depends on SERIAL_8250
config SERIAL_8250_MANY_PORTS
	bool "Support more than 4 legacy serial ports"
	depends on SERIAL_8250_EXTENDED && !IA64
config SERIAL_8250_FOURPORT
	tristate "Support Fourport cards"
	depends on SERIAL_8250 != n && ISA && SERIAL_8250_MANY_PORTS
config SERIAL_8250_ACCENT
	tristate "Support Accent cards"
	depends on SERIAL_8250 != n && ISA && SERIAL_8250_MANY_PORTS
config SERIAL_8250_BOCA
	tristate "Support Boca cards"
	depends on SERIAL_8250 != n && ISA && SERIAL_8250_MANY_PORTS

	depends on SERIAL_8250 != n && ISA && SERIAL_8250_MANY_PORTS

	depends on SERIAL_ALTERA_UART=y
	select SERIAL_CORE_CONSOLE

	depends on (X86 || PPC_MAPLE) && PCI
	default HW_RANDOM

	depends on ARCH_AT91 && HAVE_CLK && OF
	default HW_RANDOM

	tristate "Broadcom BCM63xx Random Number Generator support"
	depends on BCM63XX
	default HW_RANDOM

	depends on ARCH_BCM2835
	default HW_RANDOM

	depends on ARCH_BCM_IPROC
	default HW_RANDOM

	depends on X86_32 && PCI
	default HW_RANDOM

	depends on SPARC64
	default HW_RANDOM

	depends on X86
	default HW_RANDOM

	depends on ARCH_IXP4XX
	default HW_RANDOM
config HW_RANDOM_OMAP
	tristate "OMAP Random Number Generator support"
	depends on ARCH_OMAP16XX || ARCH_OMAP2PLUS
	default HW_RANDOM
	  Generator hardware found on OMAP16xx, OMAP2/3/4/5 and AM33xx/AM43xx
	  multimedia processors.
	  To compile this driver as a module, choose M here: the
	  module will be called omap-rng.
 	  If unsure, say Y.
config HW_RANDOM_OMAP3_ROM
	tristate "OMAP3 ROM Random Number Generator support"
	depends on ARCH_OMAP3
	default HW_RANDOM

#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/drivers/i2c/muxes/Kconfig
menu "Multiplexer I2C Chip support"
	depends on I2C_MUX
config I2C_ARB_GPIO_CHALLENGE
	tristate "GPIO-based I2C arbitration"
	depends on GPIOLIB && OF
config I2C_MUX_GPIO
	tristate "GPIO-based I2C multiplexer"
	depends on GPIOLIB
config I2C_MUX_PCA9541
	tristate "NXP PCA9541 I2C Master Selector"
config I2C_MUX_PCA954x
	tristate "Philips PCA954x I2C Mux/switches"
	depends on GPIOLIB
config I2C_MUX_PINCTRL
	tristate "pinctrl-based I2C multiplexer"
	depends on PINCTRL
endmenu
config I2C_HELPER_AUTO
	bool "Autoselect pertinent helper modules"
	default y
config I2C_SMBUS
	tristate "SMBus-specific protocols" if !I2C_HELPER_AUTO
#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/drivers/i2c/algos/Kconfig
menu "I2C Algorithms"
	visible if !I2C_HELPER_AUTO
config I2C_ALGOBIT
	tristate "I2C bit-banging interfaces"
config I2C_ALGOPCF
	tristate "I2C PCF 8584 interfaces"
config I2C_ALGOPCA
	tristate "I2C PCA 9564 interfaces"
endmenu
#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/drivers/i2c/busses/Kconfig
menu "I2C Hardware Bus support"
	depends on HAS_IOMEM
comment "PC SMBus host controller drivers"
	depends on PCI
config I2C_ALI1535
	tristate "ALI 1535"
	depends on PCI
config I2C_ALI1563
	tristate "ALI 1563"
	depends on PCI
config I2C_ALI15X3
	tristate "ALI 15x3"
	depends on PCI
config I2C_AMD756
	tristate "AMD 756/766/768/8111 and nVidia nForce"
	depends on PCI
config I2C_AMD756_S4882
	tristate "SMBus multiplexing on the Tyan S4882"
	depends on I2C_AMD756 && X86
config I2C_AMD8111
	tristate "AMD 8111"
	depends on PCI
config I2C_HIX5HD2
	tristate "Hix5hd2 high-speed I2C driver"
	depends on ARCH_HIX5HD2 || COMPILE_TEST
config I2C_I801
	tristate "Intel 82801 (ICH/PCH)"
	depends on PCI
	select CHECK_SIGNATURE if X86 && DMI
config I2C_ISCH
	tristate "Intel SCH SMBus 1.0"
	depends on PCI
	select LPC_SCH
config I2C_ISMT
	tristate "Intel iSMT SMBus Controller"
	depends on PCI && X86
config I2C_PIIX4
	tristate "Intel PIIX4 and compatible (ATI/AMD/Serverworks/Broadcom/SMSC)"
	depends on PCI
config I2C_NFORCE2
	tristate "Nvidia nForce2, nForce3 and nForce4"
	depends on PCI
config I2C_NFORCE2_S4985
	tristate "SMBus multiplexing on the Tyan S4985"
	depends on I2C_NFORCE2 && X86
config I2C_SIS5595
	tristate "SiS 5595"
	depends on PCI
config I2C_SIS630
	tristate "SiS 630/730/964"
	depends on PCI
config I2C_SIS96X
	tristate "SiS 96x"
	depends on PCI
config I2C_VIA
	tristate "VIA VT82C586B"
	depends on PCI
	select I2C_ALGOBIT
config I2C_VIAPRO
	tristate "VIA VT82C596/82C686/82xx and CX700/VX8xx/VX900"
	depends on PCI
if ACPI
comment "ACPI drivers"
config I2C_SCMI
	tristate "SMBus Control Method Interface"
endif 
comment "Mac SMBus host controller drivers"
	depends on PPC_CHRP || PPC_PMAC
config I2C_HYDRA
	tristate "CHRP Apple Hydra Mac I/O I2C interface"
	depends on PCI && PPC_CHRP
	select I2C_ALGOBIT
config I2C_POWERMAC
	tristate "Powermac I2C interface"
	depends on PPC_PMAC
	default y
comment "I2C system bus drivers (mostly embedded / system-on-chip)"
config I2C_AT91
	tristate "Atmel AT91 I2C Two-Wire interface (TWI)"
	depends on ARCH_AT91
config I2C_AU1550
	tristate "Au1550/Au1200/Au1300 SMBus interface"
	depends on MIPS_ALCHEMY
config I2C_AXXIA
	tristate "Axxia I2C controller"
	depends on ARCH_AXXIA || COMPILE_TEST
	default ARCH_AXXIA
config I2C_BCM2835
	tristate "Broadcom BCM2835 I2C controller"
	depends on ARCH_BCM2835

	tristate "Broadcom iProc I2C controller"
	depends on ARCH_BCM_IPROC || COMPILE_TEST
	default ARCH_BCM_IPROC
config I2C_BCM_KONA
	tristate "BCM Kona I2C adapter"
	depends on ARCH_BCM_MOBILE
	default y
config I2C_BLACKFIN_TWI
	tristate "Blackfin TWI I2C support"
	depends on BLACKFIN
	depends on !BF561 && !BF531 && !BF532 && !BF533
config I2C_BLACKFIN_TWI_CLK_KHZ
	int "Blackfin TWI I2C clock (kHz)"
	depends on I2C_BLACKFIN_TWI
	range 21 400
	default 50
config I2C_CADENCE
	tristate "Cadence I2C Controller"
	depends on ARCH_ZYNQ

	tristate "CBUS I2C driver"
	depends on GPIOLIB

	depends on CPM1 || CPM2

	tristate "DaVinci I2C driver"
	depends on ARCH_DAVINCI || ARCH_KEYSTONE
config I2C_DESIGNWARE_CORE
	tristate

	select I2C_DESIGNWARE_CORE
	depends on (ACPI && COMMON_CLK) || !ACPI

	tristate "Synopsys DesignWare PCI"
	depends on PCI
	select I2C_DESIGNWARE_CORE

	bool "Intel Baytrail I2C semaphore support"
	depends on I2C_DESIGNWARE_PLATFORM && IOSF_MBI=y && ACPI

	depends on ARCH_DIGICOLOR

	depends on ARCH_EFM32 || COMPILE_TEST

	depends on MACH_JZ4780 || COMPILE_TEST

	depends on PPC_PASEMI && PCI

	default n

	depends on UNICORE32 && ARCH_PUV3
	select I2C_ALGOBIT

	tristate "Intel PXA2XX I2C adapter"
	depends on ARCH_PXA || ARCH_MMP || (X86_32 && PCI && OF)

	def_bool I2C_PXA && X86_32 && PCI && OF

	bool "Intel PXA2XX I2C Slave comms support"
	depends on I2C_PXA && !X86_32

	tristate "Qualcomm QUP based I2C controller"
	depends on ARCH_QCOM

	tristate "Renesas RIIC adapter"
	depends on ARCH_SHMOBILE || COMPILE_TEST

	depends on OF && COMMON_CLK

	depends on HAVE_S3C2410_I2C

	tristate "Renesas SH7760 I2C Controller"
	depends on CPU_SUBTYPE_SH7760

	depends on ARCH_STI

	depends on MACH_U300
	default y if MACH_U300

	depends on ARCH_TEGRA

	depends on CPU_XLP || COMPILE_TEST

	tristate "Renesas R-Car I2C Controller"
	depends on ARCH_SHMOBILE || COMPILE_TEST
	select I2C_SLAVE
comment "External I2C/SMBus adapter drivers"
config I2C_DIOLAN_U2C
	tristate "Diolan U2C-12 USB adapter"
	depends on USB
config I2C_DLN2
       tristate "Diolan DLN-2 USB I2C adapter"
       depends on MFD_DLN2

	tristate "Parallel port adapter"
	depends on PARPORT
	select I2C_ALGOBIT
	select I2C_SMBUS

	tristate "Parallel port adapter (light)"
	select I2C_ALGOBIT
	select I2C_SMBUS
config I2C_ROBOTFUZZ_OSIF
	tristate "RobotFuzz Open Source InterFace USB adapter"
	depends on USB

	tristate "TAOS evaluation module"
	depends on TTY
	select SERIO
	select SERIO_SERPORT
	default n
config I2C_TINY_USB
	tristate "Tiny-USB adapter"
	depends on USB

	tristate "Viperboard I2C master support"
	depends on MFD_VIPERBOARD && USB
comment "Other I2C/SMBus bus drivers"
config I2C_ACORN
	tristate "Acorn IOC/IOMD I2C bus support"
	depends on ARCH_ACORN
	default y
	select I2C_ALGOBIT
config I2C_ELEKTOR
	tristate "Elektor ISA card"
	depends on ISA && HAS_IOPORT_MAP && BROKEN_ON_SMP
	select I2C_ALGOPCF
config I2C_PCA_ISA
	tristate "PCA9564/PCA9665 on an ISA bus"
	depends on ISA
	select I2C_ALGOPCA
	default n
config I2C_SIBYTE
	tristate "SiByte SMBus interface"
	depends on SIBYTE_SB1xxx_SOC
config I2C_CROS_EC_TUNNEL
	tristate "ChromeOS EC tunnel I2C bus"
	depends on MFD_CROS_EC
config SCx200_ACB
	tristate "Geode ACCESS.bus support"
	depends on X86_32 && PCI
config I2C_OPAL
	tristate "IBM OPAL I2C driver"
	depends on PPC_POWERNV
	default y
endmenu
config I2C_STUB
	tristate "I2C/SMBus Test Stub"
	depends on m
	default 'n'
config I2C_SLAVE
	bool "I2C slave support"
if I2C_SLAVE
config I2C_SLAVE_EEPROM
	tristate "I2C eeprom slave driver"
endif
config I2C_DEBUG_CORE
	bool "I2C Core debugging messages"
config I2C_DEBUG_ALGO
	bool "I2C Algorithm debugging messages"
config I2C_DEBUG_BUS
	bool "I2C Bus debugging messages"
	depends on HAS_IOMEM
endif 
endmenu
#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/drivers/spi/Kconfig
menuconfig SPI
	bool "SPI support"
	depends on HAS_IOMEM
if SPI
config SPI_DEBUG
	bool "Debug support for SPI drivers"
	depends on DEBUG_KERNEL
config SPI_MASTER
	bool
	default SPI
if SPI_MASTER
comment "SPI Master Controller Drivers"
config SPI_ALTERA
	tristate "Altera SPI Controller"
	select SPI_BITBANG
config SPI_ATH79
	tristate "Atheros AR71XX/AR724X/AR913X SPI controller driver"
	depends on ATH79 && GPIOLIB
	select SPI_BITBANG
config SPI_ATMEL
	tristate "Atmel SPI Controller"
	depends on HAS_DMA
	depends on (ARCH_AT91 || AVR32 || COMPILE_TEST)
config SPI_BCM2835
	tristate "BCM2835 SPI controller"
	depends on ARCH_BCM2835 || COMPILE_TEST
	depends on GPIOLIB
config SPI_BFIN5XX
	tristate "SPI controller driver for ADI Blackfin5xx"
	depends on BLACKFIN && !BF60x
config SPI_ADI_V3
	tristate "SPI controller v3 for ADI"
	depends on BF60x
config SPI_BFIN_SPORT
	tristate "SPI bus via Blackfin SPORT"
	depends on BLACKFIN
config SPI_AU1550
	tristate "Au1550/Au1200/Au1300 SPI Controller"
	depends on MIPS_ALCHEMY
	select SPI_BITBANG
config SPI_BCM53XX
	tristate "Broadcom BCM53xx SPI controller"
	depends on ARCH_BCM_5301X
	depends on BCMA_POSSIBLE
	select BCMA
config SPI_BCM63XX
	tristate "Broadcom BCM63xx SPI controller"
	depends on BCM63XX
config SPI_BCM63XX_HSSPI
	tristate "Broadcom BCM63XX HS SPI controller driver"
	depends on BCM63XX || COMPILE_TEST
config SPI_BITBANG
	tristate "Utilities for Bitbanging SPI masters"
config SPI_BUTTERFLY
	tristate "Parallel port adapter for AVR Butterfly (DEVELOPMENT)"
	depends on PARPORT
	select SPI_BITBANG
config SPI_CADENCE
	tristate "Cadence SPI controller"
config SPI_CLPS711X
	tristate "CLPS711X host SPI controller"
	depends on ARCH_CLPS711X || COMPILE_TEST
config SPI_COLDFIRE_QSPI
	tristate "Freescale Coldfire QSPI controller"
	depends on (M520x || M523x || M5249 || M525x || M527x || M528x || M532x)
config SPI_DAVINCI
	tristate "Texas Instruments DaVinci/DA8x/OMAP-L/AM1x SoC SPI controller"
	depends on ARCH_DAVINCI || ARCH_KEYSTONE
	select SPI_BITBANG
config SPI_DLN2
       tristate "Diolan DLN-2 USB SPI adapter"
       depends on MFD_DLN2
config SPI_EFM32
	tristate "EFM32 SPI controller"
	depends on OF && ARM && (ARCH_EFM32 || COMPILE_TEST)
	select SPI_BITBANG
config SPI_EP93XX
	tristate "Cirrus Logic EP93xx SPI controller"
	depends on HAS_DMA
	depends on ARCH_EP93XX || COMPILE_TEST
config SPI_FALCON
	tristate "Falcon SPI controller support"
	depends on SOC_FALCON
config SPI_GPIO
	tristate "GPIO-based bitbanging SPI Master"
	depends on GPIOLIB
	select SPI_BITBANG
config SPI_IMG_SPFI
	tristate "IMG SPFI controller"
	depends on MIPS || COMPILE_TEST
config SPI_IMX
	tristate "Freescale i.MX SPI controllers"
	depends on ARCH_MXC || COMPILE_TEST
	select SPI_BITBANG
config SPI_LM70_LLP
	tristate "Parallel port adapter for LM70 eval board (DEVELOPMENT)"
	depends on PARPORT
	select SPI_BITBANG
config SPI_MPC52xx
	tristate "Freescale MPC52xx SPI (non-PSC) controller support"
	depends on PPC_MPC52xx
config SPI_MPC52xx_PSC
	tristate "Freescale MPC52xx PSC SPI controller"
	depends on PPC_MPC52xx
config SPI_MPC512x_PSC
	tristate "Freescale MPC512x PSC SPI controller"
	depends on PPC_MPC512x
config SPI_FSL_LIB
	tristate
	depends on OF
config SPI_FSL_CPM
	tristate
	depends on FSL_SOC
config SPI_FSL_SPI
	tristate "Freescale SPI controller and Aeroflex Gaisler GRLIB SPI controller"
	depends on OF
	select SPI_FSL_LIB
	select SPI_FSL_CPM if FSL_SOC
config SPI_FSL_DSPI
	tristate "Freescale DSPI controller"
	select REGMAP_MMIO
	depends on SOC_VF610 || SOC_LS1021A || COMPILE_TEST
config SPI_FSL_ESPI
	tristate "Freescale eSPI controller"
	depends on FSL_SOC
	select SPI_FSL_LIB
config SPI_MESON_SPIFC
	tristate "Amlogic Meson SPIFC controller"
	depends on ARCH_MESON || COMPILE_TEST
	select REGMAP_MMIO
config SPI_OC_TINY
	tristate "OpenCores tiny SPI"
	depends on GPIOLIB
	select SPI_BITBANG
config SPI_OCTEON
	tristate "Cavium OCTEON SPI controller"
	depends on CAVIUM_OCTEON_SOC
config SPI_OMAP_UWIRE
	tristate "OMAP1 MicroWire"
	depends on ARCH_OMAP1
	select SPI_BITBANG
config SPI_OMAP24XX
	tristate "McSPI driver for OMAP"
	depends on HAS_DMA
	depends on ARM || ARM64 || AVR32 || HEXAGON || MIPS || SUPERH
	depends on ARCH_OMAP2PLUS || COMPILE_TEST
config SPI_TI_QSPI
	tristate "DRA7xxx QSPI controller support"
	depends on ARCH_OMAP2PLUS || COMPILE_TEST
config SPI_OMAP_100K
	tristate "OMAP SPI 100K"
	depends on ARCH_OMAP850 || ARCH_OMAP730 || COMPILE_TEST
config SPI_ORION
	tristate "Orion SPI master"
	depends on PLAT_ORION || COMPILE_TEST
config SPI_PL022
	tristate "ARM AMBA PL022 SSP controller"
	depends on ARM_AMBA
	default y if MACH_U300
	default y if ARCH_REALVIEW
	default y if INTEGRATOR_IMPD1
	default y if ARCH_VERSATILE
config SPI_PPC4xx
	tristate "PPC4xx SPI Controller"
	depends on PPC32 && 4xx
	select SPI_BITBANG
config SPI_PXA2XX_PXADMA
	bool "PXA2xx SSP legacy PXA DMA API support"
	depends on SPI_PXA2XX && ARCH_PXA
config SPI_PXA2XX_DMA
	def_bool y
	depends on SPI_PXA2XX && !SPI_PXA2XX_PXADMA
config SPI_PXA2XX
	tristate "PXA2xx SSP SPI master"
	depends on (ARCH_PXA || PCI || ACPI)
	select PXA_SSP if ARCH_PXA
config SPI_PXA2XX_PCI
	def_tristate SPI_PXA2XX && PCI && COMMON_CLK
config SPI_ROCKCHIP
	tristate "Rockchip SPI controller driver"
	depends on ARM || ARM64 || AVR32 || HEXAGON || MIPS || SUPERH
config SPI_RSPI
	tristate "Renesas RSPI/QSPI controller"
	depends on SUPERH || ARCH_SHMOBILE || COMPILE_TEST
config SPI_QUP
	tristate "Qualcomm SPI controller with QUP interface"
	depends on ARCH_QCOM || (ARM && COMPILE_TEST)
config SPI_S3C24XX
	tristate "Samsung S3C24XX series SPI"
	depends on ARCH_S3C24XX
	select SPI_BITBANG
config SPI_S3C24XX_FIQ
	bool "S3C24XX driver with FIQ pseudo-DMA"
	depends on SPI_S3C24XX
	select FIQ
config SPI_S3C64XX
	tristate "Samsung S3C64XX series type SPI"
	depends on (PLAT_SAMSUNG || ARCH_EXYNOS)
config SPI_SC18IS602
	tristate "NXP SC18IS602/602B/603 I2C to SPI bridge"
	depends on I2C
config SPI_SH_MSIOF
	tristate "SuperH MSIOF SPI controller"
	depends on HAVE_CLK && HAS_DMA
	depends on SUPERH || ARCH_SHMOBILE || COMPILE_TEST
config SPI_SH
	tristate "SuperH SPI controller"
	depends on SUPERH || COMPILE_TEST
config SPI_SH_SCI
	tristate "SuperH SCI SPI controller"
	depends on SUPERH
	select SPI_BITBANG
config SPI_SH_HSPI
	tristate "SuperH HSPI controller"
	depends on ARCH_SHMOBILE || COMPILE_TEST
config SPI_SIRF
	tristate "CSR SiRFprimaII SPI controller"
	depends on SIRF_DMA
	select SPI_BITBANG
config SPI_ST_SSC4
	tristate "STMicroelectronics SPI SSC-based driver"
	depends on ARCH_STI
config SPI_SUN4I
	tristate "Allwinner A10 SoCs SPI controller"
	depends on ARCH_SUNXI || COMPILE_TEST
config SPI_SUN6I
	tristate "Allwinner A31 SPI controller"
	depends on ARCH_SUNXI || COMPILE_TEST
	depends on RESET_CONTROLLER
config SPI_MXS
	tristate "Freescale MXS SPI controller"
	depends on ARCH_MXS
	select STMP_DEVICE
config SPI_TEGRA114
	tristate "NVIDIA Tegra114 SPI Controller"
	depends on (ARCH_TEGRA && TEGRA20_APB_DMA) || COMPILE_TEST
	depends on RESET_CONTROLLER && HAS_DMA
config SPI_TEGRA20_SFLASH
	tristate "Nvidia Tegra20 Serial flash Controller"
	depends on ARCH_TEGRA || COMPILE_TEST
	depends on RESET_CONTROLLER
config SPI_TEGRA20_SLINK
	tristate "Nvidia Tegra20/Tegra30 SLINK Controller"
	depends on (ARCH_TEGRA && TEGRA20_APB_DMA) || COMPILE_TEST
	depends on RESET_CONTROLLER && HAS_DMA
config SPI_TOPCLIFF_PCH
	tristate "Intel EG20T PCH/LAPIS Semicon IOH(ML7213/ML7223/ML7831) SPI"
	depends on PCI && (X86_32 || COMPILE_TEST)
config SPI_TXX9
	tristate "Toshiba TXx9 SPI controller"
	depends on GPIOLIB && (CPU_TX49XX || COMPILE_TEST)
config SPI_XCOMM
	tristate "Analog Devices AD-FMCOMMS1-EBZ SPI-I2C-bridge driver"
	depends on I2C
config SPI_XILINX
	tristate "Xilinx SPI controller common module"
	depends on HAS_IOMEM
	select SPI_BITBANG
config SPI_XTENSA_XTFPGA
	tristate "Xtensa SPI controller for xtfpga"
	depends on (XTENSA && XTENSA_PLATFORM_XTFPGA) || COMPILE_TEST
	select SPI_BITBANG
config SPI_NUC900
	tristate "Nuvoton NUC900 series SPI"
	depends on ARCH_W90X900
	select SPI_BITBANG
config SPI_DESIGNWARE
	tristate "DesignWare SPI controller core support"
config SPI_DW_PCI
	tristate "PCI interface driver for DW SPI core"
	depends on SPI_DESIGNWARE && PCI
config SPI_DW_MID_DMA
	bool "DMA support for DW SPI controller on Intel MID platform"
	depends on SPI_DW_PCI && DW_DMAC_PCI
config SPI_DW_MMIO
	tristate "Memory-mapped io interface driver for DW SPI core"
	depends on SPI_DESIGNWARE
comment "SPI Protocol Masters"
config SPI_SPIDEV
	tristate "User mode SPI device driver support"
config SPI_TLE62X0
	tristate "Infineon TLE62X0 (for power switching)"
	depends on SYSFS
endif 
endif

	depends on W1_SLAVE_DS2408
	default y

menuconfig POWER_RESET
	bool "Board level reset or power off"
if POWER_RESET
config POWER_RESET_AS3722
	bool "ams AS3722 power-off driver"
	depends on MFD_AS3722
config POWER_RESET_AT91_POWEROFF
	bool "Atmel AT91 poweroff driver"
	depends on ARCH_AT91
	default SOC_AT91SAM9 || SOC_SAMA5
config POWER_RESET_AT91_RESET
	bool "Atmel AT91 reset driver"
	depends on ARCH_AT91
	default SOC_AT91SAM9 || SOC_SAMA5
config POWER_RESET_AXXIA
	bool "LSI Axxia reset driver"
	depends on ARCH_AXXIA
config POWER_RESET_BRCMSTB
	bool "Broadcom STB reset driver"
	depends on ARM || MIPS || COMPILE_TEST
	depends on MFD_SYSCON
	default ARCH_BRCMSTB
config POWER_RESET_GPIO
	bool "GPIO power-off driver"
	depends on OF_GPIO
config POWER_RESET_GPIO_RESTART
	bool "GPIO restart driver"
	depends on OF_GPIO
config POWER_RESET_HISI
	bool "Hisilicon power-off driver"
	depends on ARCH_HISI
config POWER_RESET_IMX
	bool "IMX6 power-off driver"
	depends on POWER_RESET && SOC_IMX6
config POWER_RESET_MSM
	bool "Qualcomm MSM power-off driver"
	depends on ARCH_QCOM
config POWER_RESET_LTC2952
	bool "LTC2952 PowerPath power-off driver"
	depends on OF_GPIO
config POWER_RESET_QNAP
	bool "QNAP power-off driver"
	depends on OF_GPIO && PLAT_ORION
config POWER_RESET_RESTART
	bool "Restart power-off driver"
config POWER_RESET_ST
	bool "ST restart driver"
	depends on ARCH_STI
config POWER_RESET_VERSATILE
	bool "ARM Versatile family reboot driver"
	depends on ARM
	depends on MFD_SYSCON
	depends on OF
config POWER_RESET_VEXPRESS
	bool "ARM Versatile Express power-off and reset driver"
	depends on ARM || ARM64
	depends on VEXPRESS_CONFIG
config POWER_RESET_XGENE
	bool "APM SoC X-Gene reset driver"
	depends on ARM64
config POWER_RESET_KEYSTONE
	bool "Keystone reset driver"
	depends on ARCH_KEYSTONE
	select MFD_SYSCON
config POWER_RESET_SYSCON
	bool "Generic SYSCON regmap reset driver"
	depends on OF
	select MFD_SYSCON
config POWER_RESET_SYSCON_POWEROFF
	bool "Generic SYSCON regmap poweroff driver"
	depends on OF
	select MFD_SYSCON
config POWER_RESET_RMOBILE
	tristate "Renesas R-Mobile reset driver"
	depends on ARCH_RMOBILE || COMPILE_TEST
	depends on HAS_IOMEM
endif
endif

	default y

	tristate
	default n

	default n

#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/drivers/thermal/Kconfig
menuconfig THERMAL
	tristate "Generic Thermal sysfs driver"
if THERMAL
config THERMAL_HWMON
	bool
	prompt "Expose thermal sensors as hwmon device"
	depends on HWMON=y || HWMON=THERMAL
	default y
config THERMAL_OF
	bool
	prompt "APIs to parse thermal data out of device tree"
	depends on OF
	default y
choice
	prompt "Default Thermal governor"
	default THERMAL_DEFAULT_GOV_STEP_WISE
config THERMAL_DEFAULT_GOV_STEP_WISE
	bool "step_wise"
	select THERMAL_GOV_STEP_WISE
config THERMAL_DEFAULT_GOV_FAIR_SHARE
	bool "fair_share"
	select THERMAL_GOV_FAIR_SHARE
config THERMAL_DEFAULT_GOV_USER_SPACE
	bool "user_space"
	select THERMAL_GOV_USER_SPACE
endchoice
config THERMAL_GOV_FAIR_SHARE
	bool "Fair-share thermal governor"
config THERMAL_GOV_STEP_WISE
	bool "Step_wise thermal governor"
config THERMAL_GOV_BANG_BANG
	bool "Bang Bang thermal governor"
	default n
config THERMAL_GOV_USER_SPACE
	bool "User_space thermal governor"
config CPU_THERMAL
	bool "generic cpu cooling support"
	depends on CPU_FREQ
	depends on THERMAL_OF
config CLOCK_THERMAL
	bool "Generic clock cooling support"
	depends on COMMON_CLK
	depends on PM_OPP
config THERMAL_EMULATION
	bool "Thermal emulation mode support"
config IMX_THERMAL
	tristate "Temperature sensor driver for Freescale i.MX SoCs"
	depends on CPU_THERMAL
	depends on MFD_SYSCON
	depends on OF
config SPEAR_THERMAL
	bool "SPEAr thermal sensor driver"
	depends on PLAT_SPEAR
	depends on OF
config ROCKCHIP_THERMAL
	tristate "Rockchip thermal driver"
	depends on ARCH_ROCKCHIP
	depends on RESET_CONTROLLER
config RCAR_THERMAL
	tristate "Renesas R-Car thermal driver"
	depends on ARCH_SHMOBILE || COMPILE_TEST
	depends on HAS_IOMEM
config KIRKWOOD_THERMAL
	tristate "Temperature sensor on Marvell Kirkwood SoCs"
	depends on MACH_KIRKWOOD
	depends on OF
config DOVE_THERMAL
	tristate "Temperature sensor on Marvell Dove SoCs"
	depends on ARCH_DOVE || MACH_DOVE
	depends on OF
config DB8500_THERMAL
	bool "DB8500 thermal management"
	depends on ARCH_U8500
	default y
config ARMADA_THERMAL
	tristate "Armada 370/XP thermal management"
	depends on ARCH_MVEBU
	depends on OF
config TEGRA_SOCTHERM
	tristate "Tegra SOCTHERM thermal management"
	depends on ARCH_TEGRA
config DB8500_CPUFREQ_COOLING
	tristate "DB8500 cpufreq cooling"
	depends on ARCH_U8500
	depends on CPU_THERMAL
	default y
config INTEL_POWERCLAMP
	tristate "Intel PowerClamp idle injection driver"
	depends on THERMAL
	depends on X86
	depends on CPU_SUP_INTEL
config X86_PKG_TEMP_THERMAL
	tristate "X86 package temperature thermal driver"
	depends on X86_THERMAL_VECTOR
	select THERMAL_GOV_USER_SPACE
	default m
config INTEL_SOC_DTS_THERMAL
	tristate "Intel SoCs DTS thermal driver"
	depends on X86 && IOSF_MBI
config INT340X_THERMAL
	tristate "ACPI INT340X thermal drivers"
	depends on X86 && ACPI
	select THERMAL_GOV_USER_SPACE
	select ACPI_THERMAL_REL
	select ACPI_FAN
config ACPI_THERMAL_REL
	tristate
	depends on ACPI
menu "Texas Instruments thermal drivers"
#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/drivers/thermal/ti-soc-thermal/Kconfig

	tristate "Texas Instruments SoCs temperature sensor driver"
	depends on THERMAL
	depends on ARCH_HAS_BANDGAP
config TI_THERMAL
	bool "Texas Instruments SoCs thermal framework support"
	depends on TI_SOC_THERMAL
	depends on CPU_THERMAL

	bool "Texas Instruments OMAP4 thermal support"
	depends on TI_SOC_THERMAL
	depends on ARCH_OMAP4

	depends on TI_SOC_THERMAL
	depends on SOC_OMAP5

	depends on TI_SOC_THERMAL
	depends on SOC_DRA7XX
endmenu

	depends on OF

depends on ARCH_STI && OF

config ST_THERMAL
       tristate "Thermal sensors on STMicroelectronics STi series of SoCs"
config ST_THERMAL_SYSCFG
	select ST_THERMAL
	tristate "STi series syscfg register access based thermal sensors"
config ST_THERMAL_MEMMAP
	select ST_THERMAL
	tristate "STi series memory mapped access based thermal sensors"
endmenu
endif

	tristate "CP1XXX Hardware Watchdog support"
	depends on SPARC64 && PCI
config WATCHDOG_RIO
	tristate "RIO Hardware Watchdog support"
	depends on SPARC64 && PCI
config XEN_WDT
	tristate "Xen Watchdog support"
	depends on XEN
config UML_WATCHDOG
	tristate "UML watchdog"
	depends on UML
comment "ISA-based Watchdog Cards"
	depends on ISA
config PCWATCHDOG
	tristate "Berkshire Products ISA-PC Watchdog"
	depends on ISA
config MIXCOMWD
	tristate "Mixcom Watchdog"
	depends on ISA
config WDT
	tristate "WDT Watchdog timer"
	depends on ISA
comment "PCI-based Watchdog Cards"
	depends on PCI
config PCIPCWATCHDOG
	tristate "Berkshire Products PCI-PC Watchdog"
	depends on PCI
config WDTPCI
	tristate "PCI-WDT500/501 Watchdog timer"
	depends on PCI
comment "USB-based Watchdog Cards"
	depends on USB
config USBPCWATCHDOG
	tristate "Berkshire Products USB-PC Watchdog"
	depends on USB
endif 
#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/drivers/ssb/Kconfig
config SSB_POSSIBLE
	bool
	depends on HAS_IOMEM && HAS_DMA
	default y
menu "Sonics Silicon Backplane"
	depends on SSB_POSSIBLE
config SSB
	tristate "Sonics Silicon Backplane support"
	depends on SSB_POSSIBLE
config SSB_SPROM
	bool
config SSB_BLOCKIO
	bool
	depends on SSB
config SSB_PCIHOST_POSSIBLE
	bool
	depends on SSB && (PCI = y || PCI = SSB)
	default y
config SSB_PCIHOST
	bool "Support for SSB on PCI-bus host"
	depends on SSB_PCIHOST_POSSIBLE
	select SSB_SPROM
	default y
config SSB_B43_PCI_BRIDGE
	bool
	depends on SSB_PCIHOST
	default n
config SSB_PCMCIAHOST_POSSIBLE
	bool
	depends on SSB && (PCMCIA = y || PCMCIA = SSB)
	default y
config SSB_PCMCIAHOST
	bool "Support for SSB on PCMCIA-bus host"
	depends on SSB_PCMCIAHOST_POSSIBLE
	select SSB_SPROM
config SSB_SDIOHOST_POSSIBLE
	bool
	depends on SSB && (MMC = y || MMC = SSB)
	default y
config SSB_SDIOHOST
	bool "Support for SSB on SDIO-bus host"
	depends on SSB_SDIOHOST_POSSIBLE
config SSB_SILENT
	bool "No SSB kernel messages"
	depends on SSB && EXPERT
config SSB_DEBUG
	bool "SSB debugging"
	depends on SSB && !SSB_SILENT
config SSB_SERIAL
	bool
	depends on SSB
	
config SSB_DRIVER_PCICORE_POSSIBLE
	bool
	depends on SSB_PCIHOST
	default y
config SSB_DRIVER_PCICORE
	bool "SSB PCI core driver"
	depends on SSB_DRIVER_PCICORE_POSSIBLE
config SSB_PCICORE_HOSTMODE
	bool "Hostmode support for SSB PCI core"
	depends on SSB_DRIVER_PCICORE && SSB_DRIVER_MIPS
config SSB_DRIVER_MIPS
	bool "SSB Broadcom MIPS core driver"
	depends on SSB && MIPS
	select SSB_SERIAL
	select SSB_SFLASH
config SSB_SFLASH
	bool "SSB serial flash support"
	depends on SSB_DRIVER_MIPS
	default y
config SSB_EMBEDDED
	bool
	depends on SSB_DRIVER_MIPS && SSB_PCICORE_HOSTMODE
	default y
config SSB_DRIVER_EXTIF
	bool "SSB Broadcom EXTIF core driver"
	depends on SSB_DRIVER_MIPS
config SSB_DRIVER_GIGE
	bool "SSB Broadcom Gigabit Ethernet driver"
	depends on SSB_PCIHOST_POSSIBLE && SSB_EMBEDDED && MIPS
config SSB_DRIVER_GPIO
	bool "SSB GPIO driver"
	depends on SSB && GPIOLIB
	select IRQ_DOMAIN if SSB_EMBEDDED
endmenu
#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/drivers/bcma/Kconfig
config BCMA_POSSIBLE
	bool
	depends on HAS_IOMEM && HAS_DMA
	default y
menu "Broadcom specific AMBA"
	depends on BCMA_POSSIBLE
config BCMA
	tristate "BCMA support"
	depends on BCMA_POSSIBLE
config BCMA_BLOCKIO
	bool
	depends on BCMA
config BCMA_HOST_PCI_POSSIBLE
	bool
	depends on BCMA && PCI = y
	default y
config BCMA_HOST_PCI
	bool "Support for BCMA on PCI-host bus"
	depends on BCMA_HOST_PCI_POSSIBLE
	select BCMA_DRIVER_PCI
	default y
config BCMA_DRIVER_PCI_HOSTMODE
	bool "Driver for PCI core working in hostmode"
	depends on BCMA && MIPS && BCMA_HOST_PCI
config BCMA_HOST_SOC
	bool "Support for BCMA in a SoC"
	depends on BCMA
config BCMA_DRIVER_PCI
	bool "BCMA Broadcom PCI core driver"
	depends on BCMA && PCI
	default y
config BCMA_DRIVER_MIPS
	bool "BCMA Broadcom MIPS core driver"
	depends on BCMA && MIPS
config BCMA_SFLASH
	bool
	depends on BCMA_DRIVER_MIPS
	default y
config BCMA_NFLASH
	bool
	depends on BCMA_DRIVER_MIPS
	default y
config BCMA_DRIVER_GMAC_CMN
	bool "BCMA Broadcom GBIT MAC COMMON core driver"
	depends on BCMA
config BCMA_DRIVER_GPIO
	bool "BCMA GPIO driver"
	depends on BCMA && GPIOLIB
	select IRQ_DOMAIN if BCMA_HOST_SOC
config BCMA_DEBUG
	bool "BCMA debugging"
	depends on BCMA
endmenu

menuconfig MEDIA_SUPPORT
	tristate "Multimedia support"
	depends on HAS_IOMEM
if MEDIA_SUPPORT
comment "Multimedia core support"
config MEDIA_CAMERA_SUPPORT
	bool "Cameras/video grabbers support"
config MEDIA_ANALOG_TV_SUPPORT
	bool "Analog TV support"
config MEDIA_DIGITAL_TV_SUPPORT
	bool "Digital TV support"
config MEDIA_RADIO_SUPPORT
	bool "AM/FM radio receivers/transmitters support"
config MEDIA_SDR_SUPPORT
	bool "Software defined radio support"
config MEDIA_RC_SUPPORT
	bool "Remote Controller support"
	depends on INPUT
config MEDIA_CONTROLLER
	bool "Media Controller API"
	depends on MEDIA_CAMERA_SUPPORT || MEDIA_ANALOG_TV_SUPPORT || MEDIA_DIGITAL_TV_SUPPORT
config MEDIA_CONTROLLER_DVB
	bool "Enable Media controller for DVB"
	depends on MEDIA_CONTROLLER
config VIDEO_DEV
	tristate
	depends on MEDIA_SUPPORT
	depends on MEDIA_CAMERA_SUPPORT || MEDIA_ANALOG_TV_SUPPORT || MEDIA_RADIO_SUPPORT || MEDIA_SDR_SUPPORT
	default y
config VIDEO_V4L2_SUBDEV_API
	bool "V4L2 sub-device userspace API"
	depends on VIDEO_DEV && MEDIA_CONTROLLER

	default n

	default n

        tristate
        depends on VIDEOBUF2_CORE

	select DMA_SHARED_BUFFER

	select VIDEOBUF2_CORE

	select DMA_SHARED_BUFFER

	select VIDEOBUF2_CORE

	tristate "ST remote control receiver"
	depends on RC_CORE
	depends on ARCH_STI || COMPILE_TEST
config IR_SUNXI
    tristate "SUNXI IR remote control"
    depends on RC_CORE
    depends on ARCH_SUNXI || COMPILE_TEST
endif

config VIDEO_IR_I2C
	tristate "I2C module for IR" if !MEDIA_SUBDRV_AUTOSELECT
	depends on I2C && RC_CORE
	default y
menu "Encoders, decoders, sensors and other helper chips"
	visible if !MEDIA_SUBDRV_AUTOSELECT

	tristate "SMIA++/SMIA sensor support"

	select VIDEO_SMIAPP_PLL

	tristate "Samsung S5C73M3 sensor support"
	depends on I2C && SPI && VIDEO_V4L2 && VIDEO_V4L2_SUBDEV_API

	tristate "ADP1653 flash support"
	depends on I2C && VIDEO_V4L2 && MEDIA_CONTROLLER

	depends on VIDEO_V4L2 && I2C

	depends on VIDEO_V4L2 && I2C

	depends on VIDEO_V4L2 && I2C

#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/drivers/media/tuners/Kconfig
config MEDIA_TUNER
	tristate
	depends on (MEDIA_ANALOG_TV_SUPPORT || MEDIA_DIGITAL_TV_SUPPORT || MEDIA_RADIO_SUPPORT || MEDIA_SDR_SUPPORT) && I2C
	default y
	select MEDIA_TUNER_XC2028 if MEDIA_SUBDRV_AUTOSELECT
	select MEDIA_TUNER_XC5000 if MEDIA_SUBDRV_AUTOSELECT
	select MEDIA_TUNER_XC4000 if MEDIA_SUBDRV_AUTOSELECT
	select MEDIA_TUNER_MT20XX if MEDIA_SUBDRV_AUTOSELECT
	select MEDIA_TUNER_TDA8290 if MEDIA_SUBDRV_AUTOSELECT
	select MEDIA_TUNER_TEA5761 if MEDIA_SUBDRV_AUTOSELECT && MEDIA_RADIO_SUPPORT
	select MEDIA_TUNER_TEA5767 if MEDIA_SUBDRV_AUTOSELECT && MEDIA_RADIO_SUPPORT
	select MEDIA_TUNER_SIMPLE if MEDIA_SUBDRV_AUTOSELECT
	select MEDIA_TUNER_TDA9887 if MEDIA_SUBDRV_AUTOSELECT
	select MEDIA_TUNER_MC44S803 if MEDIA_SUBDRV_AUTOSELECT
menu "Customize TV tuners"
	visible if !MEDIA_SUBDRV_AUTOSELECT
	depends on MEDIA_ANALOG_TV_SUPPORT || MEDIA_DIGITAL_TV_SUPPORT || MEDIA_RADIO_SUPPORT || MEDIA_SDR_SUPPORT
config MEDIA_TUNER_SIMPLE
	tristate "Simple tuner support"
	depends on MEDIA_SUPPORT && I2C
	select MEDIA_TUNER_TDA9887
	default m if !MEDIA_SUBDRV_AUTOSELECT
config MEDIA_TUNER_TDA8290
	tristate "TDA 8290/8295 + 8275(a)/18271 tuner combo"
	depends on MEDIA_SUPPORT && I2C
	select MEDIA_TUNER_TDA827X
	select MEDIA_TUNER_TDA18271
	default m if !MEDIA_SUBDRV_AUTOSELECT
config MEDIA_TUNER_TDA827X
	tristate "Philips TDA827X silicon tuner"
	depends on MEDIA_SUPPORT && I2C
	default m if !MEDIA_SUBDRV_AUTOSELECT
config MEDIA_TUNER_TDA18271
	tristate "NXP TDA18271 silicon tuner"
	depends on MEDIA_SUPPORT && I2C
	default m if !MEDIA_SUBDRV_AUTOSELECT
config MEDIA_TUNER_TDA9887

	depends on MEDIA_SUPPORT && I2C
	default m if !MEDIA_SUBDRV_AUTOSELECT

	depends on MEDIA_SUPPORT && I2C
	default m if !MEDIA_SUBDRV_AUTOSELECT
config MEDIA_TUNER_TEA5767

	depends on MEDIA_SUPPORT && I2C
	default m if !MEDIA_SUBDRV_AUTOSELECT

#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/drivers/media/dvb-frontends/Kconfig
menu "Customise DVB Frontends"
	visible if !MEDIA_SUBDRV_AUTOSELECT
comment "Multistandard (satellite) frontends"
	depends on DVB_CORE
config DVB_STB0899
	tristate "STB0899 based"
	depends on DVB_CORE && I2C
	default m if !MEDIA_SUBDRV_AUTOSELECT
config DVB_STB6100
	tristate "STB6100 based tuners"
	depends on DVB_CORE && I2C
	default m if !MEDIA_SUBDRV_AUTOSELECT
config DVB_STV090x
	tristate "STV0900/STV0903(A/B) based"
	depends on DVB_CORE && I2C
	default m if !MEDIA_SUBDRV_AUTOSELECT
config DVB_STV6110x
	tristate "STV6110/(A) based tuners"
	depends on DVB_CORE && I2C
	default m if !MEDIA_SUBDRV_AUTOSELECT
config DVB_M88DS3103
	tristate "Montage M88DS3103"
	depends on DVB_CORE && I2C && I2C_MUX
	default m if !MEDIA_SUBDRV_AUTOSELECT
comment "Multistandard (cable + terrestrial) frontends"
	depends on DVB_CORE
config DVB_DRXK
	tristate "Micronas DRXK based"
	depends on DVB_CORE && I2C
	default m if !MEDIA_SUBDRV_AUTOSELECT
config DVB_TDA18271C2DD
	tristate "NXP TDA18271C2 silicon tuner"
	depends on DVB_CORE && I2C
	default m if !MEDIA_SUBDRV_AUTOSELECT
config DVB_SI2165
	tristate "Silicon Labs si2165 based"
	depends on DVB_CORE && I2C
	default m if !MEDIA_SUBDRV_AUTOSELECT
comment "DVB-S (satellite) frontends"
	depends on DVB_CORE

	depends on HAS_IOMEM
config HAVE_FB_ATMEL
	bool

	depends on (SUPERH || ARCH_SHMOBILE) && HAVE_CLK
