#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/lib/Kconfig.debug
menu "printk and dmesg options"
config PRINTK_TIME
	bool "Show timing information on printks"
	depends on PRINTK
config MESSAGE_LOGLEVEL_DEFAULT
	int "Default message log level (1-7)"
	range 1 7
	default "4"
config BOOT_PRINTK_DELAY
	bool "Delay each boot printk message by N milliseconds"
	depends on DEBUG_KERNEL && PRINTK && GENERIC_CALIBRATE_DELAY
config DYNAMIC_DEBUG
	bool "Enable dynamic printk() support"
	default n
	depends on PRINTK
	depends on DEBUG_FS
endmenu 
menu "Compile-time checks and compiler options"
config DEBUG_INFO
	bool "Compile the kernel with debug info"
	depends on DEBUG_KERNEL && !COMPILE_TEST
config DEBUG_INFO_REDUCED
	bool "Reduce debugging information"
	depends on DEBUG_INFO
config DEBUG_INFO_SPLIT
	bool "Produce split debuginfo in .dwo files"
	depends on DEBUG_INFO
config DEBUG_INFO_DWARF4
	bool "Generate dwarf4 debuginfo"
	depends on DEBUG_INFO
config GDB_SCRIPTS
	bool "Provide GDB scripts for kernel debugging"
	depends on DEBUG_INFO
config ENABLE_WARN_DEPRECATED
	bool "Enable __deprecated logic"
	default y
config ENABLE_MUST_CHECK
	bool "Enable __must_check logic"
	default y
config FRAME_WARN
	int "Warn for stack frames larger than (needs gcc 4.4)"
	range 0 8192
	default 1024 if !64BIT
	default 2048 if 64BIT
config STRIP_ASM_SYMS
	bool "Strip assembler-generated symbols during link"
	default n
config READABLE_ASM
        bool "Generate readable assembler code"
        depends on DEBUG_KERNEL
config UNUSED_SYMBOLS
	bool "Enable unused/obsolete exported symbols"
	default y if X86
config PAGE_OWNER
	bool "Track page owner"
	depends on DEBUG_KERNEL && STACKTRACE_SUPPORT
	select DEBUG_FS
	select STACKTRACE
	select PAGE_EXTENSION
config DEBUG_FS
	bool "Debug Filesystem"
config HEADERS_CHECK
	bool "Run 'make headers_check' when building vmlinux"
	depends on !UML
config DEBUG_SECTION_MISMATCH
	bool "Enable full Section mismatch analysis"
config ARCH_WANT_FRAME_POINTERS
	bool
config FRAME_POINTER
	bool "Compile the kernel with frame pointers"
	depends on DEBUG_KERNEL && \
		(CRIS || M68K || FRV || UML || \
		 AVR32 || SUPERH || BLACKFIN || MN10300 || METAG) || \
		ARCH_WANT_FRAME_POINTERS
	default y if (DEBUG_INFO && UML) || ARCH_WANT_FRAME_POINTERS
config DEBUG_FORCE_WEAK_PER_CPU
	bool "Force weak per-cpu definitions"
	depends on DEBUG_KERNEL
endmenu 
config MAGIC_SYSRQ
	bool "Magic SysRq key"
	depends on !UML
config MAGIC_SYSRQ_DEFAULT_ENABLE
	hex "Enable magic SysRq key functions by default"
	depends on MAGIC_SYSRQ
	default 0x1
config DEBUG_KERNEL
	bool "Kernel debugging"
menu "Memory Debugging"
#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/mm/Kconfig.debug
config PAGE_EXTENSION
	bool "Extend memmap on extra space for more information on page"
config DEBUG_PAGEALLOC
	bool "Debug page memory allocations"
	depends on DEBUG_KERNEL
	depends on !HIBERNATION || ARCH_SUPPORTS_DEBUG_PAGEALLOC && !PPC && !SPARC
	depends on !KMEMCHECK
	select PAGE_EXTENSION
	select PAGE_POISONING if !ARCH_SUPPORTS_DEBUG_PAGEALLOC
config PAGE_POISONING
	bool
config DEBUG_OBJECTS
	bool "Debug object operations"
	depends on DEBUG_KERNEL
config DEBUG_OBJECTS_SELFTEST
	bool "Debug objects selftest"
	depends on DEBUG_OBJECTS
config DEBUG_OBJECTS_FREE
	bool "Debug objects in freed memory"
	depends on DEBUG_OBJECTS
config DEBUG_OBJECTS_TIMERS
	bool "Debug timer objects"
	depends on DEBUG_OBJECTS
config DEBUG_OBJECTS_WORK
	bool "Debug work objects"
	depends on DEBUG_OBJECTS
config DEBUG_OBJECTS_RCU_HEAD
	bool "Debug RCU callbacks objects"
	depends on DEBUG_OBJECTS
config DEBUG_OBJECTS_PERCPU_COUNTER
	bool "Debug percpu counter objects"
	depends on DEBUG_OBJECTS
config DEBUG_OBJECTS_ENABLE_DEFAULT
	int "debug_objects bootup default value (0-1)"
        range 0 1
        default "1"
        depends on DEBUG_OBJECTS
config DEBUG_SLAB
	bool "Debug slab memory allocations"
	depends on DEBUG_KERNEL && SLAB && !KMEMCHECK
config DEBUG_SLAB_LEAK
	bool "Memory leak debugging"
	depends on DEBUG_SLAB
config SLUB_DEBUG_ON
	bool "SLUB debugging on by default"
	depends on SLUB && SLUB_DEBUG && !KMEMCHECK
	default n
config SLUB_STATS
	default n
	bool "Enable SLUB performance statistics"
	depends on SLUB && SYSFS
config HAVE_DEBUG_KMEMLEAK
	bool
config DEBUG_KMEMLEAK
	bool "Kernel memory leak detector"
	depends on DEBUG_KERNEL && HAVE_DEBUG_KMEMLEAK
	select DEBUG_FS
	select STACKTRACE if STACKTRACE_SUPPORT
	select KALLSYMS
	select CRC32
config DEBUG_KMEMLEAK_EARLY_LOG_SIZE
	int "Maximum kmemleak early log entries"
	depends on DEBUG_KMEMLEAK
	range 200 40000
	default 400
config DEBUG_KMEMLEAK_TEST
	tristate "Simple test for the kernel memory leak detector"
	depends on DEBUG_KMEMLEAK && m
config DEBUG_KMEMLEAK_DEFAULT_OFF

	depends on KMEMCHECK

	depends on KMEMCHECK

	depends on KMEMCHECK

	depends on KMEMCHECK
	range 2 8
	default 5

	depends on KMEMCHECK

	depends on KMEMCHECK

menu "Debug Lockups and Hangs"
config LOCKUP_DETECTOR

	depends on DEBUG_KERNEL && !S390

	def_bool y
	depends on LOCKUP_DETECTOR && !HAVE_NMI_WATCHDOG
	depends on PERF_EVENTS && HAVE_PERF_EVENTS_NMI

	bool "Panic (Reboot) On Hard Lockups"
	depends on HARDLOCKUP_DETECTOR

	int
	depends on HARDLOCKUP_DETECTOR
	range 0 1
	default 0 if !BOOTPARAM_HARDLOCKUP_PANIC
	default 1 if BOOTPARAM_HARDLOCKUP_PANIC

	depends on LOCKUP_DETECTOR
config BOOTPARAM_SOFTLOCKUP_PANIC_VALUE
	int
	depends on LOCKUP_DETECTOR
	range 0 1
	default 0 if !BOOTPARAM_SOFTLOCKUP_PANIC
	default 1 if BOOTPARAM_SOFTLOCKUP_PANIC

	depends on DETECT_HUNG_TASK

	depends on DETECT_HUNG_TASK

	select CONSOLE_POLL
	select MAGIC_SYSRQ
	depends on TTY
	default y
config KGDB_TESTS
	bool "KGDB: internal test suite"
	default n
config KGDB_TESTS_ON_BOOT
	bool "KGDB: Run tests on boot"
	depends on KGDB_TESTS
	default n
config KGDB_TESTS_BOOT_STRING
	string "KGDB: which internal kgdb tests to run"
	depends on KGDB_TESTS_ON_BOOT
	default "V1F100"
config KGDB_LOW_LEVEL_TRAP
       bool "KGDB: Allow debugging with traps in notifiers"
       depends on X86 || MIPS
       default n
config KGDB_KDB
	bool "KGDB_KDB: include kdb frontend for kgdb"
	default n
config KDB_DEFAULT_ENABLE
	hex "KDB: Select kdb command functions to be enabled by default"
	depends on KGDB_KDB
	default 0x1
config KDB_KEYBOARD
	bool "KGDB_KDB: keyboard as input device"
	depends on VT && KGDB_KDB
	default n
config KDB_CONTINUE_CATASTROPHIC
	int "KDB: continue after catastrophic errors"
	depends on KGDB_KDB
	default "0"
endif 
config STRICT_DEVMEM
	bool "Filter access to /dev/mem"
config X86_VERBOSE_BOOTUP
	bool "Enable verbose x86 bootup info messages"
	default y
config EARLY_PRINTK
	bool "Early printk" if EXPERT
	default y
config EARLY_PRINTK_DBGP
	bool "Early printk via EHCI debug port"
	depends on EARLY_PRINTK && PCI
config EARLY_PRINTK_EFI
	bool "Early printk via the EFI framebuffer"
	depends on EFI && EARLY_PRINTK
	select FONT_SUPPORT
config X86_PTDUMP
	bool "Export kernel pagetable layout to userspace via debugfs"
	depends on DEBUG_KERNEL
	select DEBUG_FS
config EFI_PGT_DUMP
	bool "Dump the EFI pagetable"
	depends on EFI && X86_PTDUMP
config DEBUG_RODATA
	bool "Write protect kernel read-only data structures"
	default y
	depends on DEBUG_KERNEL
config DEBUG_RODATA_TEST
	bool "Testcase for the DEBUG_RODATA feature"
	depends on DEBUG_RODATA
	default y
config DEBUG_SET_MODULE_RONX
	bool "Set loadable kernel module data as NX and text as RO"
	depends on MODULES
config DEBUG_NX_TEST
	tristate "Testcase for the NX non-executable stack feature"
	depends on DEBUG_KERNEL && m
config DOUBLEFAULT
	default y
	bool "Enable doublefault exception handler" if EXPERT
config DEBUG_TLBFLUSH
	bool "Set upper limit of TLB entries to flush one-by-one"
	depends on DEBUG_KERNEL
config IOMMU_DEBUG
	bool "Enable IOMMU debugging"
	depends on GART_IOMMU && DEBUG_KERNEL
	depends on X86_64
config IOMMU_STRESS
	bool "Enable IOMMU stress-test mode"
config IOMMU_LEAK
	bool "IOMMU leak tracing"
	depends on IOMMU_DEBUG && DMA_API_DEBUG
config HAVE_MMIOTRACE_SUPPORT
	def_bool y
config X86_DECODER_SELFTEST
	bool "x86 instruction decoder selftest"
	depends on DEBUG_KERNEL && KPROBES
	depends on !COMPILE_TEST
config IO_DELAY_TYPE_0X80
	int
	default "0"
config IO_DELAY_TYPE_0XED
	int
	default "1"
config IO_DELAY_TYPE_UDELAY
	int
	default "2"
config IO_DELAY_TYPE_NONE
	int
	default "3"
choice
	prompt "IO delay type"
	default IO_DELAY_0X80
config IO_DELAY_0X80
	bool "port 0x80 based port-IO delay [recommended]"
config IO_DELAY_0XED
	bool "port 0xed based port-IO delay"
config IO_DELAY_UDELAY
	bool "udelay based port-IO delay"
config IO_DELAY_NONE
	bool "no port-IO delay"
endchoice
if IO_DELAY_0X80
config DEFAULT_IO_DELAY_TYPE
	int
	default IO_DELAY_TYPE_0X80
endif
if IO_DELAY_0XED
config DEFAULT_IO_DELAY_TYPE
	int
	default IO_DELAY_TYPE_0XED
endif
if IO_DELAY_UDELAY
config DEFAULT_IO_DELAY_TYPE
	int
	default IO_DELAY_TYPE_UDELAY
endif
if IO_DELAY_NONE
config DEFAULT_IO_DELAY_TYPE
	int
	default IO_DELAY_TYPE_NONE
endif
config DEBUG_BOOT_PARAMS
	bool "Debug boot parameters"
	depends on DEBUG_KERNEL
	depends on DEBUG_FS
config CPA_DEBUG
	bool "CPA self-test code"
	depends on DEBUG_KERNEL
config OPTIMIZE_INLINING
	bool "Allow gcc to uninline functions marked 'inline'"
config DEBUG_NMI_SELFTEST
	bool "NMI Selftest"
	depends on DEBUG_KERNEL && X86_LOCAL_APIC
config DEBUG_IMR_SELFTEST
	bool "Isolated Memory Region self test"
	default n
	depends on INTEL_IMR
config X86_DEBUG_STATIC_CPU_HAS
	bool "Debug alternatives"
	depends on DEBUG_KERNEL
endmenu
#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/security/Kconfig
menu "Security options"
#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/security/keys/Kconfig
config KEYS
	bool "Enable access key retention support"
	select ASSOCIATIVE_ARRAY
config PERSISTENT_KEYRINGS
	bool "Enable register of persistent per-UID keyrings"
	depends on KEYS
config BIG_KEYS
	bool "Large payload keys"
	depends on KEYS
	depends on TMPFS
config TRUSTED_KEYS
	tristate "TRUSTED KEYS"
	depends on KEYS && TCG_TPM
	select CRYPTO
	select CRYPTO_HMAC
	select CRYPTO_SHA1
config ENCRYPTED_KEYS
	tristate "ENCRYPTED KEYS"
	depends on KEYS
	select CRYPTO
	select CRYPTO_HMAC
	select CRYPTO_AES
	select CRYPTO_CBC
	select CRYPTO_SHA256
	select CRYPTO_RNG
config SECURITY_DMESG_RESTRICT
	bool "Restrict unprivileged access to the kernel syslog"
	default n
config SECURITY
	bool "Enable different security models"
	depends on SYSFS
	depends on MULTIUSER
config SECURITYFS
	bool "Enable the securityfs filesystem"
config SECURITY_NETWORK
	bool "Socket and Networking Security Hooks"
	depends on SECURITY
config SECURITY_NETWORK_XFRM
	bool "XFRM (IPSec) Networking Security Hooks"
	depends on XFRM && SECURITY_NETWORK
config SECURITY_PATH
	bool "Security hooks for pathname based access control"
	depends on SECURITY
config INTEL_TXT
	bool "Enable Intel(R) Trusted Execution Technology (Intel(R) TXT)"
	depends on HAVE_INTEL_TXT
config LSM_MMAP_MIN_ADDR
	int "Low address space for LSM to protect from user allocation"
	depends on SECURITY && SECURITY_SELINUX
	default 32768 if ARM || (ARM64 && COMPAT)
	default 65536
#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/security/selinux/Kconfig
config SECURITY_SELINUX
	bool "NSA SELinux Support"
	depends on SECURITY_NETWORK && AUDIT && NET && INET
	select NETWORK_SECMARK
	default n
config SECURITY_SELINUX_BOOTPARAM
	bool "NSA SELinux boot parameter"
	depends on SECURITY_SELINUX
	default n
config SECURITY_SELINUX_BOOTPARAM_VALUE
	int "NSA SELinux boot parameter default value"
	depends on SECURITY_SELINUX_BOOTPARAM
	range 0 1
	default 1
config SECURITY_SELINUX_DISABLE
	bool "NSA SELinux runtime disable"
	depends on SECURITY_SELINUX
	default n
config SECURITY_SELINUX_DEVELOP
	bool "NSA SELinux Development Support"
	depends on SECURITY_SELINUX
	default y
config SECURITY_SELINUX_AVC_STATS
	bool "NSA SELinux AVC Statistics"
	depends on SECURITY_SELINUX
	default y
config SECURITY_SELINUX_CHECKREQPROT_VALUE
	int "NSA SELinux checkreqprot default value"
	depends on SECURITY_SELINUX
	range 0 1
	default 1
config SECURITY_SELINUX_POLICYDB_VERSION_MAX
	bool "NSA SELinux maximum supported policy format version"
	depends on SECURITY_SELINUX
	default n
config SECURITY_SELINUX_POLICYDB_VERSION_MAX_VALUE
	int "NSA SELinux maximum supported policy format version value"
	depends on SECURITY_SELINUX_POLICYDB_VERSION_MAX
	range 15 23
	default 19

config SECURITY_TOMOYO
	bool "TOMOYO Linux Support"
	depends on SECURITY
	depends on NET
	select SECURITYFS
	select SECURITY_PATH
	select SECURITY_NETWORK
	select SRCU
	select BUILD_BIN2C
	default n

	int "Default maximal count for learning mode"
	default 2048
	range 0 2147483647
	depends on SECURITY_TOMOYO
config SECURITY_TOMOYO_MAX_AUDIT_LOG
	int "Default maximal count for audit log"
	default 1024
	range 0 2147483647
	depends on SECURITY_TOMOYO
config SECURITY_TOMOYO_OMIT_USERSPACE_LOADER
	bool "Activate without calling userspace policy loader."
	default n
	depends on SECURITY_TOMOYO
config SECURITY_TOMOYO_POLICY_LOADER
	string "Location of userspace policy loader"
	default "/sbin/tomoyo-init"
	depends on SECURITY_TOMOYO
	depends on !SECURITY_TOMOYO_OMIT_USERSPACE_LOADER
config SECURITY_TOMOYO_ACTIVATION_TRIGGER
	string "Trigger for calling userspace policy loader"
	default "/sbin/init"
	depends on SECURITY_TOMOYO
	depends on !SECURITY_TOMOYO_OMIT_USERSPACE_LOADER

config INTEGRITY
	bool "Integrity subsystem"
	depends on SECURITY
	default y
if INTEGRITY
config INTEGRITY_SIGNATURE
	bool "Digital signature verification using multiple keyrings"
	depends on KEYS
	default n
	select SIGNATURE
config INTEGRITY_ASYMMETRIC_KEYS
	bool "Enable asymmetric keys support"
	depends on INTEGRITY_SIGNATURE
	default n
        select ASYMMETRIC_KEY_TYPE
        select ASYMMETRIC_PUBLIC_KEY_SUBTYPE
        select PUBLIC_KEY_ALGO_RSA
        select X509_CERTIFICATE_PARSER
config INTEGRITY_AUDIT
	bool "Enables integrity auditing support "
	depends on AUDIT
	default y
#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/security/integrity/ima/Kconfig
config IMA
	bool "Integrity Measurement Architecture(IMA)"
	select SECURITYFS
	select CRYPTO
	select CRYPTO_HMAC
	select CRYPTO_MD5
	select CRYPTO_SHA1
	select CRYPTO_HASH_INFO
	select TCG_TPM if HAS_IOMEM && !UML
	select TCG_TIS if TCG_TPM && X86
	select TCG_IBMVTPM if TCG_TPM && PPC_PSERIES
config IMA_MEASURE_PCR_IDX
	int
	depends on IMA
	range 8 14
	default 10
config IMA_LSM_RULES
	bool
	depends on IMA && AUDIT && (SECURITY_SELINUX || SECURITY_SMACK)
	default y
choice
	prompt "Default template"
	default IMA_NG_TEMPLATE
	depends on IMA
	config IMA_TEMPLATE
		bool "ima"
	config IMA_NG_TEMPLATE
		bool "ima-ng (default)"
	config IMA_SIG_TEMPLATE
		bool "ima-sig"
endchoice
config IMA_DEFAULT_TEMPLATE
	string
	depends on IMA
	default "ima" if IMA_TEMPLATE
	default "ima-ng" if IMA_NG_TEMPLATE
	default "ima-sig" if IMA_SIG_TEMPLATE
choice
	prompt "Default integrity hash algorithm"
	default IMA_DEFAULT_HASH_SHA1
	depends on IMA
	config IMA_DEFAULT_HASH_SHA1
		bool "SHA1 (default)"
		depends on CRYPTO_SHA1
	config IMA_DEFAULT_HASH_SHA256
		bool "SHA256"
		depends on CRYPTO_SHA256 && !IMA_TEMPLATE
	config IMA_DEFAULT_HASH_SHA512
		bool "SHA512"
		depends on CRYPTO_SHA512 && !IMA_TEMPLATE
	config IMA_DEFAULT_HASH_WP512
		bool "WP512"
		depends on CRYPTO_WP512 && !IMA_TEMPLATE
endchoice
config IMA_DEFAULT_HASH
	string
	depends on IMA
	default "sha1" if IMA_DEFAULT_HASH_SHA1
	default "sha256" if IMA_DEFAULT_HASH_SHA256
	default "sha512" if IMA_DEFAULT_HASH_SHA512
	default "wp512" if IMA_DEFAULT_HASH_WP512
config IMA_APPRAISE
	bool "Appraise integrity measurements"
	depends on IMA
	default n
config IMA_TRUSTED_KEYRING
	bool "Require all keys on the .ima keyring be signed"
	depends on IMA_APPRAISE && SYSTEM_TRUSTED_KEYRING
	depends on INTEGRITY_ASYMMETRIC_KEYS
	default y
config IMA_LOAD_X509
	bool "Load X509 certificate onto the '.ima' trusted keyring"
	depends on IMA_TRUSTED_KEYRING
	default n
config IMA_X509_PATH
	string "IMA X509 certificate path"
	depends on IMA_LOAD_X509
	default "/etc/keys/x509_ima.der"
config IMA_APPRAISE_SIGNED_INIT
	bool "Require signed user-space initialization"
	depends on IMA_LOAD_X509
	default n
#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/security/integrity/evm/Kconfig
config EVM
	bool "EVM support"
	select KEYS
	select ENCRYPTED_KEYS
	select CRYPTO_HMAC
	select CRYPTO_SHA1
	default n
config EVM_ATTR_FSUUID
	bool "FSUUID (version 2)"
	default y
	depends on EVM
config EVM_EXTRA_SMACK_XATTRS
	bool "Additional SMACK xattrs"
	depends on EVM && SECURITY_SMACK
	default n
endif   
choice
	prompt "Default security module"
	default DEFAULT_SECURITY_SELINUX if SECURITY_SELINUX
	default DEFAULT_SECURITY_SMACK if SECURITY_SMACK
	default DEFAULT_SECURITY_TOMOYO if SECURITY_TOMOYO
	default DEFAULT_SECURITY_APPARMOR if SECURITY_APPARMOR
	default DEFAULT_SECURITY_YAMA if SECURITY_YAMA
	default DEFAULT_SECURITY_DAC
	config DEFAULT_SECURITY_SELINUX
		bool "SELinux" if SECURITY_SELINUX=y
	config DEFAULT_SECURITY_SMACK
		bool "Simplified Mandatory Access Control" if SECURITY_SMACK=y
	config DEFAULT_SECURITY_TOMOYO
		bool "TOMOYO" if SECURITY_TOMOYO=y
	config DEFAULT_SECURITY_APPARMOR
		bool "AppArmor" if SECURITY_APPARMOR=y
	config DEFAULT_SECURITY_YAMA
		bool "Yama" if SECURITY_YAMA=y
	config DEFAULT_SECURITY_DAC
		bool "Unix Discretionary Access Controls"
endchoice
config DEFAULT_SECURITY
	string
	default "selinux" if DEFAULT_SECURITY_SELINUX
	default "smack" if DEFAULT_SECURITY_SMACK
	default "tomoyo" if DEFAULT_SECURITY_TOMOYO
	default "apparmor" if DEFAULT_SECURITY_APPARMOR
	default "yama" if DEFAULT_SECURITY_YAMA
	default "" if DEFAULT_SECURITY_DAC
endmenu

menuconfig CRYPTO
	tristate "Cryptographic API"
if CRYPTO
comment "Crypto core or helper"
config CRYPTO_FIPS
	bool "FIPS 200 compliance"
	depends on (CRYPTO_ANSI_CPRNG || CRYPTO_DRBG) && !CRYPTO_MANAGER_DISABLE_TESTS
	depends on MODULE_SIG
config CRYPTO_ALGAPI
	tristate
	select CRYPTO_ALGAPI2
config CRYPTO_ALGAPI2
	tristate

	tristate
	select CRYPTO_AEAD2
	select CRYPTO_ALGAPI
config CRYPTO_AEAD2
	tristate
	select CRYPTO_ALGAPI2
config CRYPTO_BLKCIPHER

	select CRYPTO_BLKCIPHER2
	select CRYPTO_ALGAPI

	tristate
	select CRYPTO_ALGAPI2
	select CRYPTO_RNG2

	select CRYPTO_HASH2
	select CRYPTO_ALGAPI
config CRYPTO_HASH2
	tristate
	select CRYPTO_ALGAPI2
config CRYPTO_RNG

	select CRYPTO_RNG2

config CRYPTO_RNG2
	tristate
	select CRYPTO_ALGAPI2

	select CRYPTO_PCOMP2
	select CRYPTO_ALGAPI

	tristate
	select CRYPTO_ALGAPI2
config CRYPTO_MANAGER
	tristate "Cryptographic algorithm manager"
	select CRYPTO_MANAGER2
config CRYPTO_MANAGER2
	def_tristate CRYPTO_MANAGER || (CRYPTO_MANAGER!=n && CRYPTO_ALGAPI=y)
	select CRYPTO_AEAD2
	select CRYPTO_HASH2
	select CRYPTO_BLKCIPHER2
	select CRYPTO_PCOMP2
config CRYPTO_USER
	tristate "Userspace cryptographic algorithm configuration"
	depends on NET
	select CRYPTO_MANAGER
config CRYPTO_MANAGER_DISABLE_TESTS
	bool "Disable run-time self tests"
	default y
	depends on CRYPTO_MANAGER2
config CRYPTO_GF128MUL
	tristate "GF(2^128) multiplication functions"
config CRYPTO_NULL
	tristate "Null algorithms"
	select CRYPTO_ALGAPI
	select CRYPTO_BLKCIPHER
	select CRYPTO_HASH
config CRYPTO_PCRYPT
	tristate "Parallel crypto engine"
	depends on SMP
	select PADATA
	select CRYPTO_MANAGER
	select CRYPTO_AEAD
config CRYPTO_WORKQUEUE
       tristate

	select CRYPTO_HASH
	select CRYPTO_MANAGER

	tristate "Authenc support"

	select CRYPTO_BLKCIPHER
	select CRYPTO_MANAGER
	select CRYPTO_HASH

	depends on m
	select CRYPTO_MANAGER

	select CRYPTO_CRYPTD

	depends on X86

comment "Authenticated Encryption with Associated Data"

	tristate "HMAC support"

	tristate "VMAC support"
	select CRYPTO_HASH

config CRYPTO_CRC32C
	tristate "CRC32c CRC algorithm"
	select CRYPTO_HASH
	select CRC32
config CRYPTO_CRC32C_INTEL
	tristate "CRC32c INTEL hardware acceleration"
	depends on X86
	select CRYPTO_HASH

	tristate "CRC32c CRC algorithm (SPARC64)"
	depends on SPARC64
	select CRYPTO_HASH
	select CRC32
config CRYPTO_CRC32
	tristate "CRC32 CRC algorithm"
	select CRYPTO_HASH
	select CRC32
config CRYPTO_CRC32_PCLMUL
	tristate "CRC32 PCLMULQDQ hardware acceleration"
	depends on X86
	select CRYPTO_HASH
	select CRC32
config CRYPTO_CRCT10DIF
	tristate "CRCT10DIF algorithm"
	select CRYPTO_HASH
config CRYPTO_CRCT10DIF_PCLMUL
	tristate "CRCT10DIF PCLMULQDQ hardware acceleration"
	depends on X86 && 64BIT && CRC_T10DIF
	select CRYPTO_HASH
config CRYPTO_GHASH
	tristate "GHASH digest algorithm"
	select CRYPTO_GF128MUL
config CRYPTO_MD4
	tristate "MD4 digest algorithm"

	depends on X86

	select CRYPTO_GLUE_HELPER_X86 if 64BIT
	select CRYPTO_LRW
	select CRYPTO_XTS

menuconfig CRYPTO_DRBG_MENU
	tristate "NIST SP800-90A DRBG"
if CRYPTO_DRBG_MENU
config CRYPTO_DRBG_HMAC
	bool "Enable HMAC DRBG"
	default y
	select CRYPTO_HMAC
config CRYPTO_DRBG_HASH
	bool "Enable Hash DRBG"
	select CRYPTO_HASH
config CRYPTO_DRBG_CTR
	bool "Enable CTR DRBG"
	select CRYPTO_AES
config CRYPTO_DRBG
	tristate
	default CRYPTO_DRBG_MENU if (CRYPTO_DRBG_HMAC || CRYPTO_DRBG_HASH || CRYPTO_DRBG_CTR)
	select CRYPTO_RNG
endif

menuconfig CRYPTO_HW
	bool "Hardware crypto devices"
	default y
if CRYPTO_HW
config CRYPTO_DEV_PADLOCK
	tristate "Support for VIA PadLock ACE"
	depends on X86 && !UML
config CRYPTO_DEV_PADLOCK_AES
	tristate "PadLock driver for AES algorithm"
	depends on CRYPTO_DEV_PADLOCK
	select CRYPTO_BLKCIPHER
	select CRYPTO_AES
config CRYPTO_DEV_PADLOCK_SHA
	tristate "PadLock driver for SHA1 and SHA256 algorithms"
	depends on CRYPTO_DEV_PADLOCK
	select CRYPTO_HASH
	select CRYPTO_SHA1
	select CRYPTO_SHA256
config CRYPTO_DEV_GEODE
	tristate "Support for the Geode LX AES engine"
	depends on X86_32 && PCI
	select CRYPTO_ALGAPI
	select CRYPTO_BLKCIPHER
config ZCRYPT
	tristate "Support for PCI-attached cryptographic adapters"
	depends on S390
	select HW_RANDOM
config CRYPTO_SHA1_S390
	tristate "SHA1 digest algorithm"
	depends on S390
	select CRYPTO_HASH
config CRYPTO_SHA256_S390
	tristate "SHA256 digest algorithm"
	depends on S390
	select CRYPTO_HASH
config CRYPTO_SHA512_S390
	tristate "SHA384 and SHA512 digest algorithm"
	depends on S390
	select CRYPTO_HASH
config CRYPTO_DES_S390
	tristate "DES and Triple DES cipher algorithms"
	depends on S390
	select CRYPTO_ALGAPI
	select CRYPTO_BLKCIPHER
	select CRYPTO_DES
config CRYPTO_AES_S390
	tristate "AES cipher algorithms"
	depends on S390
	select CRYPTO_ALGAPI
	select CRYPTO_BLKCIPHER
config S390_PRNG
	tristate "Pseudo random number generator device driver"
	depends on S390
	default "m"
config CRYPTO_GHASH_S390
	tristate "GHASH digest algorithm"
	depends on S390
	select CRYPTO_HASH
config CRYPTO_DEV_MV_CESA
	tristate "Marvell's Cryptographic Engine"
	depends on PLAT_ORION
	select CRYPTO_ALGAPI
	select CRYPTO_AES
	select CRYPTO_BLKCIPHER2
	select CRYPTO_HASH
config CRYPTO_DEV_NIAGARA2
       tristate "Niagara2 Stream Processing Unit driver"
       select CRYPTO_DES
       select CRYPTO_ALGAPI
       depends on SPARC64
config CRYPTO_DEV_HIFN_795X
	tristate "Driver HIFN 795x crypto accelerator chips"
	select CRYPTO_DES
	select CRYPTO_ALGAPI
	select CRYPTO_BLKCIPHER
	select HW_RANDOM if CRYPTO_DEV_HIFN_795X_RNG
	depends on PCI
	depends on !ARCH_DMA_ADDR_T_64BIT
config CRYPTO_DEV_HIFN_795X_RNG
	bool "HIFN 795x random number generator"
	depends on CRYPTO_DEV_HIFN_795X
#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/drivers/crypto/caam/Kconfig
config CRYPTO_DEV_FSL_CAAM
	tristate "Freescale CAAM-Multicore driver backend"
	depends on FSL_SOC
config CRYPTO_DEV_FSL_CAAM_JR
	tristate "Freescale CAAM Job Ring driver backend"
	depends on CRYPTO_DEV_FSL_CAAM
	default y
config CRYPTO_DEV_FSL_CAAM_RINGSIZE
	int "Job Ring size"
	depends on CRYPTO_DEV_FSL_CAAM_JR
	range 2 9
	default "9"
config CRYPTO_DEV_FSL_CAAM_INTC
	bool "Job Ring interrupt coalescing"
	depends on CRYPTO_DEV_FSL_CAAM_JR
	default n
config CRYPTO_DEV_FSL_CAAM_INTC_COUNT_THLD
	int "Job Ring interrupt coalescing count threshold"
	depends on CRYPTO_DEV_FSL_CAAM_INTC
	range 1 255
	default 255
config CRYPTO_DEV_FSL_CAAM_INTC_TIME_THLD
	int "Job Ring interrupt coalescing timer threshold"
	depends on CRYPTO_DEV_FSL_CAAM_INTC
	range 1 65535
	default 2048
config CRYPTO_DEV_FSL_CAAM_CRYPTO_API
	tristate "Register algorithm implementations with the Crypto API"
	depends on CRYPTO_DEV_FSL_CAAM && CRYPTO_DEV_FSL_CAAM_JR
	default y
	select CRYPTO_ALGAPI
	select CRYPTO_AUTHENC
config CRYPTO_DEV_FSL_CAAM_AHASH_API
	tristate "Register hash algorithm implementations with Crypto API"
	depends on CRYPTO_DEV_FSL_CAAM && CRYPTO_DEV_FSL_CAAM_JR
	default y
	select CRYPTO_HASH
config CRYPTO_DEV_FSL_CAAM_RNG_API
	tristate "Register caam device for hwrng API"
	depends on CRYPTO_DEV_FSL_CAAM && CRYPTO_DEV_FSL_CAAM_JR
	default y
	select CRYPTO_RNG
	select HW_RANDOM
config CRYPTO_DEV_FSL_CAAM_DEBUG
	bool "Enable debug output in CAAM driver"
	depends on CRYPTO_DEV_FSL_CAAM
	default n
config CRYPTO_DEV_TALITOS
	tristate "Talitos Freescale Security Engine (SEC)"
	select CRYPTO_ALGAPI
	select CRYPTO_AUTHENC
	select HW_RANDOM
	depends on FSL_SOC
config CRYPTO_DEV_IXP4XX
	tristate "Driver for IXP4xx crypto hardware acceleration"
	depends on ARCH_IXP4XX && IXP4XX_QMGR && IXP4XX_NPE
	select CRYPTO_DES
	select CRYPTO_ALGAPI
	select CRYPTO_AUTHENC
	select CRYPTO_BLKCIPHER
config CRYPTO_DEV_PPC4XX
	tristate "Driver AMCC PPC4xx crypto accelerator"
	depends on PPC && 4xx
	select CRYPTO_HASH
	select CRYPTO_ALGAPI
	select CRYPTO_BLKCIPHER
config CRYPTO_DEV_OMAP_SHAM
	tristate "Support for OMAP MD5/SHA1/SHA2 hw accelerator"
	depends on ARCH_OMAP2PLUS
	select CRYPTO_SHA1
	select CRYPTO_MD5
	select CRYPTO_SHA256
	select CRYPTO_SHA512
	select CRYPTO_HMAC

	tristate "Support for OMAP AES hw engine"
	depends on ARCH_OMAP2 || ARCH_OMAP3 || ARCH_OMAP2PLUS
	select CRYPTO_AES
	select CRYPTO_BLKCIPHER2
config CRYPTO_DEV_OMAP_DES
	tristate "Support for OMAP DES3DES hw engine"
	depends on ARCH_OMAP2PLUS
	select CRYPTO_DES
	select CRYPTO_BLKCIPHER2
config CRYPTO_DEV_PICOXCELL
	tristate "Support for picoXcell IPSEC and Layer2 crypto engines"
	depends on ARCH_PICOXCELL && HAVE_CLK
	select CRYPTO_AES
	select CRYPTO_AUTHENC
	select CRYPTO_ALGAPI
	select CRYPTO_DES
	select CRYPTO_CBC
	select CRYPTO_ECB
	select CRYPTO_SEQIV
config CRYPTO_DEV_SAHARA
	tristate "Support for SAHARA crypto accelerator"
	depends on ARCH_MXC && OF
	select CRYPTO_BLKCIPHER
	select CRYPTO_AES
	select CRYPTO_ECB
config CRYPTO_DEV_S5P
	tristate "Support for Samsung S5PV210/Exynos crypto accelerator"
	depends on ARCH_S5PV210 || ARCH_EXYNOS
	select CRYPTO_AES
	select CRYPTO_ALGAPI
	select CRYPTO_BLKCIPHER
config CRYPTO_DEV_NX
	bool "Support for IBM Power7+ in-Nest cryptographic acceleration"
	depends on PPC64 && IBMVIO && !CPU_LITTLE_ENDIAN
	default n
if CRYPTO_DEV_NX
#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/drivers/crypto/nx/Kconfig
config CRYPTO_DEV_NX_ENCRYPT
	tristate "Encryption acceleration support"
	depends on PPC64 && IBMVIO
	default y
	select CRYPTO_AES
	select CRYPTO_CBC
	select CRYPTO_ECB
	select CRYPTO_CCM
	select CRYPTO_GCM
	select CRYPTO_AUTHENC
	select CRYPTO_XCBC
	select CRYPTO_SHA256
	select CRYPTO_SHA512
config CRYPTO_DEV_NX_COMPRESS
	tristate "Compression acceleration support"
	depends on PPC64 && IBMVIO
	default y
endif

	tristate "Driver for ST-Ericsson UX500 crypto hardware acceleration"
	depends on ARCH_U8500
	select CRYPTO_ALGAPI
if CRYPTO_DEV_UX500
#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/drivers/crypto/ux500/Kconfig
config CRYPTO_DEV_UX500_CRYP
	tristate "UX500 crypto driver for CRYP block"
	depends on CRYPTO_DEV_UX500
	select CRYPTO_DES
config CRYPTO_DEV_UX500_HASH
        tristate "UX500 crypto driver for HASH block"
        depends on CRYPTO_DEV_UX500
        select CRYPTO_HASH
        select CRYPTO_HMAC
config CRYPTO_DEV_UX500_DEBUG
	bool "Activate ux500 platform debug-mode for crypto and hash block"
	depends on CRYPTO_DEV_UX500_CRYP || CRYPTO_DEV_UX500_HASH
	default n
endif 
config CRYPTO_DEV_BFIN_CRC
	tristate "Support for Blackfin CRC hardware"
	depends on BF60x
config CRYPTO_DEV_ATMEL_AES
	tristate "Support for Atmel AES hw accelerator"
	depends on ARCH_AT91
	select CRYPTO_CBC
	select CRYPTO_ECB
	select CRYPTO_AES
	select CRYPTO_ALGAPI
	select CRYPTO_BLKCIPHER
	select AT_HDMAC
config CRYPTO_DEV_ATMEL_TDES
	tristate "Support for Atmel DES/TDES hw accelerator"
	depends on ARCH_AT91
	select CRYPTO_DES
	select CRYPTO_CBC
	select CRYPTO_ECB
	select CRYPTO_ALGAPI
	select CRYPTO_BLKCIPHER
config CRYPTO_DEV_ATMEL_SHA
	tristate "Support for Atmel SHA hw accelerator"
	depends on ARCH_AT91
	select CRYPTO_SHA1
	select CRYPTO_SHA256
	select CRYPTO_SHA512
	select CRYPTO_ALGAPI
config CRYPTO_DEV_CCP
	bool "Support for AMD Cryptographic Coprocessor"
	depends on ((X86 && PCI) || (ARM64 && (OF_ADDRESS || ACPI))) && HAS_IOMEM
	default n
if CRYPTO_DEV_CCP
#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/drivers/crypto/ccp/Kconfig
config CRYPTO_DEV_CCP_DD
	tristate "Cryptographic Coprocessor device driver"
	depends on CRYPTO_DEV_CCP
	default m
	select HW_RANDOM
config CRYPTO_DEV_CCP_CRYPTO
	tristate "Encryption and hashing acceleration support"
	depends on CRYPTO_DEV_CCP_DD
	default m
	select CRYPTO_ALGAPI
	select CRYPTO_HASH
	select CRYPTO_BLKCIPHER
	select CRYPTO_AUTHENC
endif
config CRYPTO_DEV_MXS_DCP
	tristate "Support for Freescale MXS DCP"
	depends on ARCH_MXS
	select CRYPTO_SHA1
	select CRYPTO_SHA256
	select CRYPTO_CBC
	select CRYPTO_ECB
	select CRYPTO_AES
	select CRYPTO_BLKCIPHER
	select CRYPTO_ALGAPI
#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/drivers/crypto/qat/Kconfig
config CRYPTO_DEV_QAT
	tristate
	select CRYPTO_AEAD
	select CRYPTO_AUTHENC
	select CRYPTO_ALGAPI
	select CRYPTO_AES
	select CRYPTO_CBC
	select CRYPTO_SHA1
	select CRYPTO_SHA256
	select CRYPTO_SHA512
	select FW_LOADER
config CRYPTO_DEV_QAT_DH895xCC
	tristate "Support for Intel(R) DH895xCC"
	depends on X86 && PCI
	default n
	select CRYPTO_DEV_QAT
config CRYPTO_DEV_QCE
	tristate "Qualcomm crypto engine accelerator"
	depends on (ARCH_QCOM || COMPILE_TEST) && HAS_DMA && HAS_IOMEM
	select CRYPTO_AES
	select CRYPTO_DES
	select CRYPTO_ECB
	select CRYPTO_CBC
	select CRYPTO_XTS
	select CRYPTO_CTR
	select CRYPTO_ALGAPI
	select CRYPTO_BLKCIPHER
config CRYPTO_DEV_VMX
	bool "Support for VMX cryptographic acceleration instructions"
	depends on PPC64
	default n
#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/drivers/crypto/vmx/Kconfig
config CRYPTO_DEV_VMX_ENCRYPT
	tristate "Encryption acceleration support on P8 CPU"
	depends on PPC64 && CRYPTO_DEV_VMX
	default y
config CRYPTO_DEV_IMGTEC_HASH
	tristate "Imagination Technologies hardware hash accelerator"
	depends on MIPS || COMPILE_TEST
	depends on HAS_DMA
	select CRYPTO_ALGAPI
	select CRYPTO_MD5
	select CRYPTO_SHA1
	select CRYPTO_SHA256
	select CRYPTO_HASH
endif 
#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/crypto/asymmetric_keys/Kconfig
menuconfig ASYMMETRIC_KEY_TYPE
	tristate "Asymmetric (public-key cryptographic) key type"
	depends on KEYS
if ASYMMETRIC_KEY_TYPE
config ASYMMETRIC_PUBLIC_KEY_SUBTYPE
	tristate "Asymmetric public-key crypto algorithm subtype"
	select MPILIB
	select PUBLIC_KEY_ALGO_RSA
	select CRYPTO_HASH_INFO
config PUBLIC_KEY_ALGO_RSA
	tristate "RSA public-key algorithm"
	select MPILIB
config X509_CERTIFICATE_PARSER
	tristate "X.509 certificate parser"
	depends on ASYMMETRIC_PUBLIC_KEY_SUBTYPE
	select ASN1
	select OID_REGISTRY
config PKCS7_MESSAGE_PARSER
	tristate "PKCS
	depends on X509_CERTIFICATE_PARSER
	select ASN1
	select OID_REGISTRY
config PKCS7_TEST_KEY
	tristate "PKCS
	depends on PKCS7_MESSAGE_PARSER
	select SYSTEM_TRUSTED_KEYRING
config SIGNED_PE_FILE_VERIFICATION
	bool "Support for PE file signature verification"
	depends on PKCS7_MESSAGE_PARSER=y
	select ASN1
	select OID_REGISTRY
endif 
endif	
#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/arch/x86/kvm/Kconfig
#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/virt/kvm/Kconfig
config HAVE_KVM
       bool
config HAVE_KVM_IRQCHIP
       bool
config HAVE_KVM_IRQFD
       bool
config HAVE_KVM_IRQ_ROUTING
       bool
config HAVE_KVM_EVENTFD
       bool
       select EVENTFD
config KVM_APIC_ARCHITECTURE
       bool
config KVM_MMIO
       bool
config KVM_ASYNC_PF
       bool
config KVM_ASYNC_PF_SYNC
       bool
config HAVE_KVM_MSI
       bool
config HAVE_KVM_CPU_RELAX_INTERCEPT
       bool
config KVM_VFIO
       bool
config HAVE_KVM_ARCH_TLB_FLUSH_ALL
       bool
config KVM_GENERIC_DIRTYLOG_READ_PROTECT
       bool
config KVM_COMPAT
       def_bool y
       depends on COMPAT && !S390
menuconfig VIRTUALIZATION
	bool "Virtualization"
	depends on HAVE_KVM || X86
	default y
if VIRTUALIZATION
config KVM
	tristate "Kernel-based Virtual Machine (KVM) support"
	depends on HAVE_KVM
	depends on HIGH_RES_TIMERS
	
	depends on NET
	select PREEMPT_NOTIFIERS
	select MMU_NOTIFIER
	select ANON_INODES
	select HAVE_KVM_IRQCHIP
	select HAVE_KVM_IRQFD
	select HAVE_KVM_IRQ_ROUTING
	select HAVE_KVM_EVENTFD
	select KVM_APIC_ARCHITECTURE
	select KVM_ASYNC_PF
	select USER_RETURN_NOTIFIER
	select KVM_MMIO
	select TASKSTATS
	select TASK_DELAY_ACCT
	select PERF_EVENTS
	select HAVE_KVM_MSI
	select HAVE_KVM_CPU_RELAX_INTERCEPT
	select KVM_GENERIC_DIRTYLOG_READ_PROTECT
	select KVM_VFIO
	select SRCU
config KVM_INTEL
	tristate "KVM for Intel processors support"
	depends on KVM
	
	depends on CPU_SUP_INTEL
config KVM_AMD
	tristate "KVM for AMD processors support"
	depends on KVM
config KVM_MMU_AUDIT
	bool "Audit KVM MMU"
	depends on KVM && TRACEPOINTS
config KVM_DEVICE_ASSIGNMENT
	bool "KVM legacy PCI device assignment support"
	depends on KVM && PCI && IOMMU_API
	default y
#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/drivers/vhost/Kconfig
config VHOST_NET
	tristate "Host kernel accelerator for virtio net"
	depends on NET && EVENTFD && (TUN || !TUN) && (MACVTAP || !MACVTAP)
	select VHOST
	select VHOST_RING
config VHOST_SCSI
	tristate "VHOST_SCSI TCM fabric driver"
	depends on TARGET_CORE && EVENTFD && m
	select VHOST
	select VHOST_RING
	default n
config VHOST_RING
	tristate
config VHOST
	tristate
#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/drivers/lguest/Kconfig
config LGUEST
	tristate "Linux hypervisor example code"
	depends on X86_32 && EVENTFD && TTY && PCI_DIRECT
	select HVC_DRIVER
endif

	def_bool n
menu "Library routines"

	tristate

config CRC_CCITT
	tristate "CRC-CCITT functions"
config CRC16
	tristate "CRC16 functions"
config CRC_T10DIF
	tristate "CRC calculation for the T10 Data Integrity Field"
	select CRYPTO
	select CRYPTO_CRCT10DIF
config CRC_ITU_T
	tristate "CRC ITU-T V.41 functions"
config CRC32
	tristate "CRC32/CRC32c functions"
	default y
	select BITREVERSE
config CRC32_SELFTEST
	bool "CRC32 perform self test on init"
	default n
	depends on CRC32
choice
	prompt "CRC32 implementation"
	depends on CRC32
	default CRC32_SLICEBY8
config CRC32_SLICEBY8
	bool "Slice by 8 bytes"
config CRC32_SLICEBY4
	bool "Slice by 4 bytes"
config CRC32_SARWATE
	bool "Sarwate's Algorithm (one byte at a time)"
config CRC32_BIT
	bool "Classic Algorithm (one bit at a time)"
endchoice
config CRC7
	tristate "CRC7 functions"
config LIBCRC32C
	tristate "CRC32c (Castagnoli, et al) Cyclic Redundancy-Check"
	select CRYPTO
	select CRYPTO_CRC32C
config CRC8
	tristate "CRC8 function"
config AUDIT_GENERIC
	bool
	depends on AUDIT && !AUDIT_ARCH
	default y
config AUDIT_ARCH_COMPAT_GENERIC
	bool
	default n
config AUDIT_COMPAT_GENERIC
	bool
	depends on AUDIT_GENERIC && AUDIT_ARCH_COMPAT_GENERIC && COMPAT
	default y
config RANDOM32_SELFTEST
	bool "PRNG perform self test on init"
	default n

#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/lib/xz/Kconfig
config XZ_DEC
	tristate "XZ decompression support"
	select CRC32
if XZ_DEC
config XZ_DEC_X86
	bool "x86 BCJ filter decoder" if EXPERT
	default y
	select XZ_DEC_BCJ
config XZ_DEC_POWERPC
	bool "PowerPC BCJ filter decoder" if EXPERT
	default y
	select XZ_DEC_BCJ
config XZ_DEC_IA64
	bool "IA-64 BCJ filter decoder" if EXPERT
	default y
	select XZ_DEC_BCJ
config XZ_DEC_ARM
	bool "ARM BCJ filter decoder" if EXPERT
	default y
	select XZ_DEC_BCJ
config XZ_DEC_ARMTHUMB
	bool "ARM-Thumb BCJ filter decoder" if EXPERT
	default y
	select XZ_DEC_BCJ
config XZ_DEC_SPARC
	bool "SPARC BCJ filter decoder" if EXPERT
	default y
	select XZ_DEC_BCJ
endif
config XZ_DEC_BCJ
	bool
	default n
config XZ_DEC_TEST
	tristate "XZ decompressor tester"
	default n
	depends on XZ_DEC

	default y

	depends on HAS_IOMEM && !NO_IOPORT_MAP
	default y

	bool
	depends on !NO_DMA
	default y

#################### https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/plain/lib/fonts/Kconfig
config FONT_SUPPORT
	tristate
if FONT_SUPPORT
config FONTS
	bool "Select compiled-in fonts"
	depends on FRAMEBUFFER_CONSOLE || STI_CONSOLE
config FONT_8x8
	bool "VGA 8x8 font" if FONTS
	depends on FRAMEBUFFER_CONSOLE || STI_CONSOLE
	default y if !SPARC && !FONTS
config FONT_8x16
	bool "VGA 8x16 font" if FONTS
	default y if !SPARC && !FONTS
config FONT_6x11
	bool "Mac console 6x11 font (not supported by all drivers)" if FONTS
	depends on FRAMEBUFFER_CONSOLE || STI_CONSOLE
	default y if !SPARC && !FONTS && MAC
config FONT_7x14
	bool "console 7x14 font (not supported by all drivers)" if FONTS
	depends on FRAMEBUFFER_CONSOLE
config FONT_PEARL_8x8
	bool "Pearl (old m68k) console 8x8 font" if FONTS
	depends on FRAMEBUFFER_CONSOLE
	default y if !SPARC && !FONTS && AMIGA
config FONT_ACORN_8x8
	bool "Acorn console 8x8 font" if FONTS
	depends on FRAMEBUFFER_CONSOLE
	default y if !SPARC && !FONTS && ARM && ARCH_ACORN
config FONT_MINI_4x6
	bool "Mini 4x6 font"
	depends on !SPARC && FONTS
config FONT_6x10
	bool "Medium-size 6x10 font"
	depends on !SPARC && FONTS
config FONT_SUN8x16
	bool "Sparc console 8x16 font"
	depends on FRAMEBUFFER_CONSOLE && (!SPARC && FONTS || SPARC)
config FONT_SUN12x22
	bool "Sparc console 12x22 font (not supported by all drivers)"
	depends on FRAMEBUFFER_CONSOLE && (!SPARC && FONTS || SPARC)
config FONT_10x18
	bool "console 10x18 font (not supported by all drivers)" if FONTS
	depends on FRAMEBUFFER_CONSOLE
config FONT_AUTOSELECT
	def_bool y
	depends on !FONT_8x8
	depends on !FONT_6x11
	depends on !FONT_7x14
	depends on !FONT_PEARL_8x8
	depends on !FONT_ACORN_8x8
	depends on !FONT_MINI_4x6
	depends on !FONT_6x10
	depends on !FONT_SUN8x16
	depends on !FONT_SUN12x22
	depends on !FONT_10x18
	select FONT_8x16
endif 
config ARCH_HAS_SG_CHAIN
	def_bool n
endmenu
